Summary: Neat, extra clean with well-designed and appointed rooms. The place doesn't look like much from the curb, but the room was excellent. Fantastic shower. Great location right at Crescent Bay. Covered parking too!
Manager Response: Thank you and glad to hear you enjoyed what we have to offer! Our staff works hard for your peace of mind during your trip. We hope your stay was all you hoped for. See you again soon, from all of us at The Crescent Bay Inn.

Summary: November last year we stayed in Crescent Bay Inn to visit friends and to enjoy this lovely area. Because of our real good experiences last time recently we stayed again in this hotel. Don't be afraid of the exterior. The interior is up dated real well. A very good king bed and the (rain)shower is just perfect. Clean room! Especially rooms in the third building have ocean view.The staff is very kind and most helpful; Josh, the surfer, is the best!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us again here at the Crescent Bay Inn, we are thrilled to hear that you all had a great time. Thank you again for all the kind words, we can't wait to see you guys again soon!

Summary: From the outside Crescent Bay Inn looks like a basic little Ma and Pa operation.  But the rooms are clean and contemporary and comfortable.  The staff we ran into was kind and helpful.  The location an easy drive to downtown.  We had a really nice evening around the fire pit.  Would go back.
Manager Response: From all of us at the Crescent Bay Inn, we would like to say thank you for your stay. We are glad our friendly and cozy atmosphere helped make you feel comfortable. Hope you had a fun trip, and wish to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great motel choice in North Laguna
Summary: My wife and I wanted to find a nice room at a good price in North Laguna and this place definitely fit the bill. The external appearance of the hotel is rather old but don't let that fool you. Our king room was completely updated and modern, we could not have been happier. The young man at the front desk was very gracious and helpful. And the price was right.
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for staying with us! We are overjoyed that you were able to feel taken care of on all levels here. Your comfort is our top priority, and we are glad the staff and value of our inn was able to accommodate to your needs and wants. Hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: Perfect place for a quick stay in Laguna
Summary: Was in town for a wedding and needed a place to crash.  The exterior appearance is a tad underwhelming, but the room was awesome and very clean and the staff was very attentive.  Incredible location and great value.
Manager Response: We here a the Crescent Bay Inn want to thank you for your stay, and hope you had fun at the wedding. We are glad you enjoyed the room and that the staff was to your standards. Hope to see you again!

Summary: Agree with most other reviews.  Rooms are very nice.  Great service. very close walk to beautiful beach.  They have beach towels, chairs and umbrellas for the beach.  Some pastries and waters/sodas available at reception. Would love to come back soon.
Manager Response: We appreciate your company here at the Crescent Bay Inn. Our staff is glad to hear you enjoyed your time spent with us. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Very good value for price. Our room was away from the road and the hotel was a short walk from a pleasant beach. Room nicely decorated and well maintained. Staff friendly and helpful. Parking, bottled water, coffee etc all included as were beach chairs and beach towels on request.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our recently renovated rooms, accommodations and our staff. We hope to see you again in the near future, Thank you!

Summary: The room is very clean and newly rennovated. When you drive up you might have 2nd thoughts, but don't. The room was great.  Just what we needed as we were not there very much. The guys that run the place are really nice and accommodating.  They let us use their beach chairs too.  There is easy access to a "local" beach.  It was perfect. I prefer to stay off the beaten track and away from all the tourists.  So it was easy access to anywhere we wanted to go.
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for your stay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations, staff and easy access to the beach! We hope to see you again soon, thank you!

Summary: It was a wonderful place to stay.  We enjoyed our time there and it was close to newport and laguna.  The front desk staff were extremely helpful with checking in and out and made our trip really easy.  I highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay. We love hearing that you had a wonderful time and that you enjoyed our staff! Thank you for your kind words and recommendation, we look forward to seeing you again in the future, Thank you!

Summary Heading: Fantastic location and quality for the price, highly recommend
Summary: I was really surprised by how modern and well furnished the interior was, very comfortable bed and beautifully updated. Staff was very helpful, and it was a short walk to a gorgeous beach. I'm not easily impressed, but this place beat my expectations and I would definitely recommend it. Basic amenities, but exactly what we wanted, especially for the price.
Manager Response: We appreciate your company here at the Crescent Bay Inn. Our staff is glad to hear you enjoyed your time spent with us. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Josh at the front desk is amazing. I really enjoyed staying here, the rooms were nice & the bed very comfortable. Rooms are very clean and beautifully decorated. I had an ocean view from my room. I will always return here when visiting Laguna.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay. It was an absolute pleasure to have you as our guest and we are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms, and staff. We look forward to your return and appreciate all the kind words. Thank you!

Summary: Clean room, Air Conditioning if needed, friendly staff that was very helpful. Worked out well for a busy weekend in Laguna Beach. A little ways from the village but the trolley is available, so everything worked well.
Manager Response: We appreciate your company here at the Crescent Bay Inn. Our staff is glad to hear you enjoyed your time spent with us. We hope to see you again!

Summary: My husband and I stayed for just one night, but it was a great stay! The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was clean, and even had a bit of ocean view! The beach that is a minute from the inn is beautiful! It was also very easy to just hop in your car and get to all the restaurants and shopping. Great stay! Thanks crescent bay inn!
Manager Response: We appreciate your company here at the Crescent Bay Inn. Our staff is glad to hear you enjoyed your time spent with us. We hope to see you again!

Summary: Very nice accomodations and just a short walk to Crescent Beach. Small, secluded beach that is just beautiful. Room was very nice, recently remodeled, bed was very comfortable. Outside the inn shows its age, but inside is good and the office staff is excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay here at the Crescent Bay Inn. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our staff, accommodations and enjoyed the easy access to our beautiful and secluded Crescent Bay beach. Thank you for the kind words and we hope to have you as guests again in the near future!

Summary: The room was comfortable, updated, and the bathroom (with rain shower) felt very upscale for the quaint inn. For being just off the street, it was not overly noisy, and even though we didn’t book an ocean view room, we still had a partial view of the ocean anyway. Knowing that Laguna Beach is a very expensive destination, Crescent Bay Inn is a good option – especially considering that you are within walking distance of the beach. Would I recommend it? Absolutely! Just keep in mind that everything on the coast is expensive; your money will not go as far here as in other parts of the country (or even inland CA for that matter).
Manager Response: We here at the Crescent Bay Inn would like to say thank you for staying with us, and it is so great to hear that you guys had a fantastic time during your stay. We greatly appreciate your recommendations and we hope to have you as our guest again, Thank you!

Summary: Seriously this place is a hidden gem of Laguna!!! Ocean views and private walkway right to Crescent beach. The rooms are completely re-done, the shower is amazing and everything feels brand new. This place is really well run. Everyone is extra friendly. The private fire pit was an extra perk that I really enjoyed. I would highly recommend staying here. We were able to walk to restaurants and were right next to a trolley stop so we could cruise down to The Deck, grab dinner and drinks and trolley right back.  Thanks Crescent Bay Inn, you guys rock.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay inn we would like to thank you for your stay and kind review. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed everything our property has to offer, and took advantage of it all! We strive to provide a friendly, clean, and relaxing environment, and we are totally thrilled to hear that your stay with us encompassed just that! Thank you for the recommendation. We really hope to see you guys again in the near future, thank you!

Summary: Location of this property is excellent.  Only steps to one of the nicest beaches in SoCal.  Hotel is also convenient to Crystal Cove State Park, which is amazing. Highly recommend Nick's in Laguna for some tasty food.    On the negative, the room was a little dusty and could have been cleaner.  Maid service didn't exactly make the bed every day and we only had one washcloth to start. The stairs were pretty dirty with cobwebs and the outdoor furniture was missing most of the cushions.  This didn't affect the great time we had.    This property could be outstanding with a little attention.  We'd stay here again but wouldn't pay more than what we did.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn. We could not agree more that the close and easy access to the beach is both convenient and amazing, thank you for your suggestions about our property as we aim highly to provide an excellent, clean, and relaxing environment for all of our guests. We hope to have you again sometime soon, Thank you!

Summary: We were in town for a wedding and loved staying at Crescent Bay Inn. We were able to check in early, 1:00 PM (check in at 4 PM) for a wedding at 5:00, which was most appreciated after flying in from Seattle. The room had a great view of the ocean, relaxing bed and awesome shower. The room decor was modern and clean with nice amenities, including a microwave, refrigerator, and smart tv. The inn was quiet, despite being on Highway 1. My only suggestion would be to add a full length mirror in the room. Highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay! We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed the ocean view from your room as well as our rain showers and custom beds. Thank you for your kind words and recommendation we hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Lovely greetings from the guys that run the reception. The room is the best part in that it is newly renovated with good amenities. The lovely cove beach is only short walk away. Chairs and umbrellas available for use as well as towels for beach.Breakfast room closed down so only free pastries available for breakfast as well as all day sodas, water, tea and coffee. Location is short 10 min drive to lovely laguna main street which runs alongside continious beaches and coves. Can walk there in 30 mins along lovely coastal walk.
Manager Response: Thank you on behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay here with us. We welcome you back next time you're in Laguna. Hope to see you again real soon.

Summary Heading: Modern, Clean, Convenient Beach and Village Access - Great Choice!
Summary: This is a nice place. The rooms are recently remodeled, modern, and clean. The pros: very friendly and helpful staff, comfortable beds, proximity key cards, big flat screen TV, spacious bathroom, rain showers, complimentary refreshments in the lobby, easy beach access.  A few tips:  you might want to bring your own pillows as the beds have more decorative pillows than regular pillows. I don't know that the decorative pillows get cleaned regularly.... I had a room facing PCH and was concerned about traffic noise which actually ended up not being bad. The rooms are designed well, and a white noise maker helped a lot.   The breakfast room was closed during my visit, and I'm not sure why. There are some nice breakfast/brunch spots in town and the rooms include a Keurig, microwave,
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay, we are happy to hear that your experience with us was a great one, and that you had enjoyed your overall Laguna Beach Visit. Our breakfast room is currently under remodeling and we plan to have it back up and running very soon! We are happy to hear that you also enjoyed the rest of our amenities and accommodations during your stay. We look forward to your return, Thank you!

Summary: Nice service. Nice room.  The hot water in our room was scalding (you have been warned) and there are tables at the foot of the bed with sharp edges, you or your partner will likely bump this at some point.  Sorry.  We had a view of the ocean from our room but it was still a 5-minute walk down to the beach.  There is on-site free parking, but is is cramped for an SUV.  This hotel is on the main street of Laguna Beach but not within walking distance of the village center.   The local beach at Crescent Bay is nice with enclosing basaltic rock formations.  There's no pool or spa, but there is an outdoor fire pit and seating.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay. Thank your for letting us know about the water, we will take immediate action to address the issue. We appreciate all the feedback and we hope to see you again during your next trip to Laguna Beach, Thank you!

Summary: Travelling down the West Coast with wife and 2 kids, we wanted to stop in Laguna Bay but found some of the hotels a bit pricey (although they all looked fabulous). Read the reviews on Crescent Bay Inn and thought we would try it.  As most people say it doesn't look stunning from the outside but we were met by cheerful friendly staff and our room was much better than we expected, clean, comfy good beds/shower/TV and useful fridge in room. Although we didn't have a spectacular view, we hadn't come to spend time in our room. The 5min walk down to the beach was easy if steep on the way back and a fab beach once there. The free trams were frequent and close to the hotel which made travel easy, although we walked back to the hotel from the centre each night which was about 15-20 mins
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn, we are thrilled to hear that your stay with us was better than expected! We strive to provide a comfortable, clean and laid back environment for all of our guest. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the beach access as well as all of our amenities, although our breakfast room is currently under renovations, we hope to have it back up and running shortly! Thank you for all the kind words and for the recommendation, we hope to see you again!

Summary: We were greeted by Oren, he was very attentive to our questions, and was laid back as I would expect from someone working at small beach hotel.  His demeanor added to the relaxing feel of the hotel.  The rooms were clean, and newly remodeled.  And it is just a short, very nice walk to the beach where my wife and I sat and watched the sunset.  Also, our room had a nice view of the ocean. We will definitely return .
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for choosing to stay with us. Our staff strives to create a comfortable, "at home" atmosphere for every guest. We also work hard to keep each room, and the property as clean as possible. Your review is appreciated and your return would be the greatest compliment! Hope to see you soon. Thank you!

Summary: So, I never write reviews, but I felt the need to this time.  I booked this for a one night get away for my husband and I who live in Orange County but did not want to spend $800 at the Surf and Sand.  Based on the reviews, I was like this place is a steal for $220.  Well you get what you pay for even though $220 is still alot!.  The room was small (really small) but ok got past that.  It was located right on PCH and the noise was loud.  The bed was comfy and the bathroom was great.  There was no alarm clock, which whatever I was looking forward to sleeping in and the phone didn't work, which wouldn't be a problem unless the smoke alarm started going off at 6:30am the next morning.  The office wasn't open and our phone didn't work.  So we lived with the every 30sec beep until
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent bay inn we would like to thank you for your stay, however we are extremely sorry to hear that your experience with us was less than satisfactory. Unfortunately not all of our rooms are located off the highway, which can be noisy at night due to slight traffic, and we apologize for all the technical difficulties you had experienced with the phones, and fire alarm, we are diligently working on taking care of these issues. We strive to provide an excellent service and relaxing environment for all of our guests and we sincerely apologize for all the inconveniences. Please contact us, thank you!

Summary Heading: Great little hotel in great location.
Summary: The staff were superb lifting this hotel above others. Saying that the hotel is well appointed and very clean. Location just a walk into town and short distance to beach.. Add space for pool and it would be complete.
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for your stay. Your gracious feedback is appreciated and we hope to see you again soon. Thank you!

Summary: Stopped here for a night and the experience was wonderful! The front desk was very helpful and polite, going out of their way for us. And the room was clean, the bed was comfortable and the view of the ocean was fantastic. And only a short walk from the beach! I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we appreciate your stay here with us. Our staff aims to please and provide excellent service, we appreciate your positive feedback. We hope to see you soon, thank you!

Summary: The staff was very helpful with restaurant recommendations. The room was very clean and comfortable. We have stayed here twice and will continue to visit. The microwave and refrigerator in the bathroom was a little weird.
Manager Response: We here at the Crescent Bay Inn appreciate your awesome feedback. Our staff is thrilled to hear you enjoyed our recommendations. We are looking forward to your return. Thank you!

Summary: Service was awesome.  Josh was terrific, offering us everything and anything we needed.  Our room was clean and nice.  We were in room 302, next to the stairs and firepit so we did have outside noise, but when people are enjoying themselves, who cares?  View is gorgeous, however, remember this is an old fashioned motel-style building so you can only enjoy the view if your door is open.  There are no verandas.  That said, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay.  This was reminiscent of the Carmel "inns".  If you want fancy and you want privacy (ala a veranda to enjoy your morning coffee in your pj's) this is not your place.  If you want a fair price for a room in Laguna Beach during the weekend, this is your place.  After all, how much time are you really spending in your room?
Manager Response: On behalf of Crescent Bay Inn we'd like to thank you for staying with us. We strive to provide an experience next to none. When you are here you are family. We are glad you enjoyed your room as well as all of our amenities. We hope to see you again in the future,Thank you!

Summary Heading: Good location, Modern new interior, Friendly and helpful staff
Summary: Good location...One mile from the downtown area, so quite easy to walk to, but a very short trolley or Uber/taxi ride if you can't do the walk (or just don't feel like it). The price may seem a little steep, but when you do your research it's actually very reasonable for the area. The room has been updated, so everything is very modern. Very nice decor, new large t.v., and attractive furniture/fixtures. Carpet had some stains, but overall the room felt very clean. The hotel was very quiet except for people occasionally walking up the stairs and into their rooms (we were on the first floor next to the stairway). Hotel staff (front desk) were incredibly friendly, helpful, and accommodating. Only suggestions to hotel: oil the hinges of the bathroom door (super squeaky at night!)
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay. Thank you for taking the time to give us some great feedback, it is our mission to make sure all of our guests are happy and taken care of during their stay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our newly updated rooms and amenities. We appreciate the suggestions and we will address them immediately. We hope to see you again in the near future, Thank you!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay here and will definitely go back! The staff was really friendly and helpful. I am so happy that the place is clean and relaxing. For me that's one of the most important thing when checking in at a hotel. Will recommend Crescent Bay to some friends. :-)
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for your stay! It brings us much joy to hear that you enjoyed your time here with us. Thank your for the kind words and recommendations, we are definitely looking forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Better inside than it looks on the outside
Summary: I was concerned about the appearance as we approached but fortunately the upgraded interior is comfortable and clean eventhough the furniture is evidently very cheap and probably won't withstand hotel use for long. Our bedroom was big enough for the the two of us. There was water and tea/coffee available throughout the day. The hotel is north of Broadway/Laguna Canyon which means it is a little easier to drive to/from since most of the other hotels and restaurants are south of this point. There are a few restaurants nearby that you can walk to but to get to downtown, wear comfortable shoes or drive. I would make the observation that the young men on reception were helpful but rather unattentive. One of them barely looked up from the phone/tablet whilst I was trying to engage in
Manager Response: Happy to hear you enjoyed your stay here with us. We do apologize for the inattentiveness at the front desk. We will definitely work on that. We hope you enjoyed your stay otherwise. Hope to earn your business again. Thank you for choosing Crescent Bay Inn.

Summary: Registration was easy and the staff was so nice and accommodating.  Parking was easy and close to the room.  The room looked like it had been remodeled and the room was very clean.  We could see the ocean from our room and the beach was close.  We walked into town and had a great breakfast.  We will stay here again.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our accommodations and property renovations, as well as our easy access to the beach and distance into town! We look forward to your return, Thank you!

Summary Heading: Fantastic value - great rooms, location and staff
Summary: We booked the Crescent Bay Inn on the strength of Trip Advisor reviews and they are fully justified.  Shane at reception was super helpful with check-in, room allocation, fire-pit lighting, directions to beach and restaurants etc.  The rooms are big, recently refurbished and very clean.  3 minute walk to the beach direct from the property, and there are beach chairs, parasols, body boards etc available to borrow free of charge.
Manager Response: I'm very happy to hear you guys all felt welcomed and accommodated while staying here with us. On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay. We hope to see you again really soon.

Summary: I love how this hotel had a small family business feel to it compare to the big corporation. stayed in room 107 and had a blast. From the moment we arrived we were treated like family. Will be back again when in laguna. Plus they have there own little beach thats 3mins away from the hotel.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we'd like to thank you for your stay here with us. We would love to have you back soon. So happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: Walk to the beach is under 5 minutes, rooms are fresh and newly renovated. Parking is available and free of course. We found this one of our most relaxing hotels because everything for a nice beach day can be found there. Including beach chairs, towels and even surfboards. That are small things which are creating a lot of goodwill, compliments! The beach nearby is nicely located and there are very strong waves (when we were there). This hotel was a perfect stay for us right before we had to go back to LAX.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn! We are thrilled to hear you had a relaxing stay with us and happy you took advantage of our beach supplies to enjoy the beach! We hope to see you again soon next time you choose to spend another relaxing day here in Laguna Beach, Thank you!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay at the Crescent Bay Inn.  The room was modern and comfortable, front desk staff were professional, friendly, and efficient, and the location and beach access were absolutely fantastic!
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn, we'd like to thank you for your stay here with us. Happy to hear that our staff was friendly and professional. Looking forward to having you back for another stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice motel close to the beach.
Summary: The biggest advantage to this motel is you can walk to the beach. It is a short block but there are quite a few steps down to the sand which might prove difficult for some people. The rooms are nicely appointed. The only disappointments were we expecting a tub/shower and free breakfast per the website. There was a shower only and when we called the front desk about breakfast the first morning we were told that they don't have it but we were welcome to coffee, bottled water, and sodas. When we checked out we mentioned to the desk clerk that they need to update their website about the breakfast and he said that they do offer small pastries-would we want some? We were leaving and had already had something to eat from the groceries we bought. There are very few rooms that have an
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we'd like to thank you for your stay here with us. Glad you enjoyed the beach access we provide. We do apologize for the no breakfast, we do look to get that back up and running as soon as possible. We welcome you back for another stay soon.

Summary: We stayed two nights and the room was perfect for 2 adults and 2 kids. It was great to be able to park the car and walk to the beach and into town. The trolley car stop is also close by. Crescent Bay is a lovely beach for swimming and exploring the rock pools. The hotel has beach towels, chairs, umbrellas etc, which was fantastic as we didn't have our own, and laundry room on site. Shop across the street for drinks and snacks. We were happy we stayed here.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with here at Crescent Bay Inn. So thrilled to hear your stay here with us was satisfactory. Happy to know the beach and the tide pools provided you guys some good fun. Looking forward to seeing you guys again.

Summary: This motel is not really average, it just averages out the pros and cons. Pros: Nicely remodeled modern rooms, with well-functioning air conditioning, refrigerator and microwave. Our room was quiet.  Free water and soda, Keurig coffeemaker, pastries.A lovely little beach cove down the hill. Cons: three buildings and grounds need repair work, tidying up, and painting. Some details problematic: a blanket on one of the beds with lots of holes in it, a rusty bar in the shower, a missing smoke alarm, a hole in the bathroom wall. No makeup mirror.  Stairs and walkways noisy at times, no elevator. Like all Laguna hotels in the summer/with the Pageant, prices are much higher than they should be. Great location for the Pageant on the last stop of the shuttle
Manager Response: We are in the midst of doing some remodeling of the outside of the hotel. The smoke alarm has been replaced and was temporarily out of the room due to needing some repairs. We are glad to hear our location was conveniently located to the pageant for you.

Summary: Pressed to locate a hotel along the beautiful coast we found this little nugget.   I will say that there was nothing fancy but this little spot was updated nicely and very, very clean.  The staff was courteous and very helpful.   I would recommend this hotel for those that just want the basics but insist on modern clean accommodations and Great ovation.
Manager Response: Thank you on behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn. We are thrilled to hear your stay here with us was one to remember. Happy to know that our room were clean to the right standards and we hope to have you back again soon.

Summary Heading: excellent rooms, excellent location, great service.  Overall excellent experience.
Summary: Would highly recommend this location for any traveler. Excellent location.  Great service from staff.  Extremely clean and modern rooms.  High speed free wifi.  free parking garage steps away from your room.  steps to the beach.  food, starbucks and beach without ever getting back into your vehicle.  free use of beach chairs and umbrellas.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we'd like to thank you for staying with us. We are delighted to hear your stay with us was a friendly and warm experience. Hope to have you come back soon.

Summary Heading: Nice rooms with an easy walk to the beach.
Summary: One of the best features is that the hotel provides beach towels, chairs, umbrellas and boogy boards.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.  The rooms are very clean, with really nice showers.  The breakfast is only light pastries and coffee, but they provide water and soda all day.  We were only here one night, but completely enjoyed it.
Manager Response: Delighted to here your stay with us was enjoyable. Please come visit us again soon on your next vacation down to Laguna. Happy to hear our rooms were clean and met your expectations. On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we thank your for your stay with us. Looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Thank you to all at the hotel. We have just stayed for a few nights and were made to feel really welcome. The two guys we met at the reception were genuinely friendly and very helpful. The hotel was really well located a very short walk off Crescent Bay and right by the free trolley bus if you want to go to the main beach. Although the hotel doesn't look fantastic from the outside, don't be perturbed, the rooms are lovely and modern in side.  The hotel also provide coffee, cold drinks and beach towels, chairs, body boards and umbrellas to borrow for the beach, which is a nice touch.
Manager Response: On behalf of Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay. I'm glad to hear our staff was nice and accommodating, we strive to make our guest feel as if they are right at home! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our close location to the beach and easy access to the free trolley! Thank you for your kind review and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: It only gets a three based on hotel being close to beach.
Summary: I have stayed in Laguna Beach many times over the years since we have family nearby. We are used to paying exorbitant rates for old, small hotel rooms because that's a lot of what is in the area. That said, I am shocked that so many TripAdvisor reviewers gave this place 5 stars. Seriously.    1.  Don't give a place a 5 star rating just because it's better than a dump you stayed at in Minnesota.  2.  Don't give a place a 5 star rating solely based on location.   Negatives:  The room was small, limited amenities, hair dryer I found in a drawer and its handle was not clean. The room was somewhat clean, had a small hole in the wall under the light switch in the bathroom and the door to the hotel room itself was hard to lock. The foldout bed was horrible. Just garbage. The staff
Manager Response: We do apologize that your stay here with us wasn't a five star experience. We do genuinely get many of our guests having a five star experience here with us at Crescent Bay Inn. We are sorry for not having our breakfast room open. We should have that up and running very soon.

Summary: We stayed here for one night earlier this month as a stopover between locations,really wished we'd stayed longer. Rooms modern and clean,two very comfortable beds,nice linens,towels and toiletries. They really have thought of everything. From our friendly welcoming check-in,to complimentary water,soft drinks,coffee and morning pastries,free use of beach chairs,parasols and body boards,this place was so relaxing. After a hectic few weeks travelling across from east to west,our time spent here was perfect. Only a short walk to a beautiful cove and easy reach to Laguna if you want to venture a little further out. There is a handy store across the road for essentials and a cold beer at cheap prices. The guy on reception even recommended a local pizza co when we wanted a take out and
Manager Response: Wow, very thrilled to hear about your stay with us being so relaxing. That's exactly the kind of vibe we try to portray here at the Crescent Bay Inn. We will be happy and excited to have you back for a visit soon.

Summary: We stayed here and glad we did! Hotel staff was very nice. Beach was less than a 5 minute walk! Rooms were small but very clean. I would def recommend this place! Don't let the outside fool you. Depending on which room you get, you can see the ocean.
Manager Response: On behalf of Crescent Bay Inn I'm glad to hear our staff was nice and accommodating to you while staying with us. We like to keep a clean and tidy room. We will see you for your next getaway to Laguna.

Summary: Great location//great price/great accommodations-what's not to love?! My husband and i stayed here this past week and enjoyed our experience.  Yes, it looks more like a motel than a hotel, but don't let that put you off. It was clean, our room was spacious, and it's a 3 minute walk to the beach!  Owners were friendly and very helpful. We walked into town through Heisler Park-gorgeous...but if you don't want to walk the trolley stops a 1/2 block away.  We will be back the next time we come to Laguna!
Manager Response: We are very happy to hear about your stay with us being satisfactory. We hope to serve your needs again real soon. We do appreciate the kind review and are glad the trolley was convenient. See you next time.

Summary: This place is extremely well priced compared to other accommodation in Laguna Beach. Whilst from the outside it doesn't look much the rooms have been recently refurbished and are very well appointed and comfortable.   The staff are very friendly and helpful and quite laid back.    The location, whilst on the main road, the rooms were very quiet.  We had a room down the back of the property and had ocean views.  It's a short walk down to Crescent Bay beach which is a nice quiet little beach.  About a 10 minute walk down the hill to the main beach and shopping area.    I can definitely recommend this place if you are cost conscious as for the price it punches well above its weight.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we'd like to thank you for your stay with us. We welcome you back anytime and are happy to know that you enjoyed our establishment. See you soon.

Summary: Nothing's cheap on the California coast, however we were pleased to find the reasonably priced Crescent Bay Inn. While the hotel can't boast of water views, there is a path that will get guests down to a secluded beach cove. Rooms were clean and neat. We made use of the room's refrigerator and enjoyed the room's relatively new furnishings. While the price is excellent, be warned that you will need to drive into Laguna Beach; it's a little too far to walk to the shops and restaurants from the hotel. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we'd like to thank you for staying with us. So happy to hear all the positive things you you had mentioned above about our establishment. We do try and make our prices fair so we can get a variety of guests staying with us. Please come back and see us again.

Summary: We only spent one night here but it was perfectly fine. We were warmly greeted when we arrived. Our room looked exactly like the website. We walked to Mandarin King for a wonderful dinner and then took the trolley to check out Laguna at night. Our boys usually swim at Picnic beach but both thought Crescent Bay was far better. It is so close to the trolley stop. I think anyone would be happy here.
Manager Response: Very thrilled to hear you and your family enjoyed your night with us here at Crescent Bay Inn. We would love to have you back, come and see us again soon.

Summary: We just returned from a 4 day stay at this property.  Nicest staff ever!  Short walk to the beach... 3 minutes down a really cute path. Renovated rooms with the most comfortable beds, nice big TV, great shower and lovely fire pit sitting area for fun family evenings. Good wifi and chairs, umbrellas and towels available for the beach.  Quiet and charming. We will definitely be back.  Not fancy, just a comfortable friendly place.  Thank you Crescent Bay Inn for a great stay!
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for staying with us! It means so much to us that you found our staff friendly and helpful. We like to do anything for our guest to make their stay a special one. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our rooms and amenities. We are looking forward to your return, Thank you!

Summary Heading: Everyone very friendly and helpful rooms had everything your neded.
Summary: Was in town for Pageant of Maters which was the best production yet. Staff gave excellent service.  Love the location and the fact you can go all over Laguna on the free trolley and walk down to the ocean.  Will definately stay here again when we are in the area.
Manager Response: Happy to hear you enjoyed your stay here with us. Laguna Beach really is a great little city with lots of entertainment like the Pageant and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed the show! We welcome you back anytime you decide to come back. Thank you for the positive feedback we do appreciate it. Please don't hesitate to come back and visit us.

Summary Heading: NICE HOTEL FOR A REASONABLE PRICE
Summary: I rated this hotel a 5 for its price range.  I'm sure there are nicer hotels, but for a lower price for this area, we found it to be comfortable and clean.  It doesn't look like much when you drive up, but our room appeared to be recently remodeled and had a large flat-screen TV, A/C, a comfortable king-sized bed, free WiFi, refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, hair dryer, and a nice bathroom and shower.  They also had free coffee and soft drinks in the lobby, a nearby ice machine, and free parking.  They usually have a continental breakfast, but the breakfast room was being updated.  It is a bit of a hike to the beach, but nice scenery along the way.  Some of the rooms face the road, but ours was on the back of that building and was quiet.  I think most of the rooms are
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for your stay. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our comfortable rooms and easy location to the beach. We could not agree more that our exterior does not look like much, but our rooms have all been recently renovated! Thank you so much for the great review and we can't wait to accomodate you again. Thank you!

Summary: We stayed here for our honeymoon. The room was cleaned, nicely decorated, bathroom modernized. Small fridge and microwave. Within walking distance from the beach and downtown area, restaurants, bars and stores. We enjoyed our stay and the staff was great. We recommend it and will stay here again when we come back to Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay. We are thrilled to hear that you chose our location to celebrate your honeymoon! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our staff, rooms and easy access to the beach. Thank you for your recommendation, we look forward to your return Thank you!

Summary Heading: Good place to stay in Laguna Beach
Summary: The rooms are much nicer than the outside suggests.  Room was great - nice furnishings, nice bathroom, microwave and refrigerator.  The free summer trolley picks up right next door (so you don't have to drive into town).  Fire pit and path to the beach as well.  Free towels for beach.  Without the trolley - it is a bit of hike to downtown.
Manager Response: Yes the trolley is very convenient seeing how we are just a short walk to it. Very happy to hear you had such positive things to say about our establishment. Looking forward to your next stay here with us.

Summary: We booked two nights at this property and left after one night.  The attributes are location, access to a gorgeous beach, and surprisingly quiet if your room is in the rear building.  The room we had was clean and the Kohler shower was excellent.  The room floor tilted to the North as the building is old and settling.  The door lock to the room would not work unless you lifted slightly on the door.  The carpet was significantly stained.  The beds were mushy, and the pillows were not down.  Good property if you got kids who just need a roof and a bed; not any kind of destination property.  Ask for a room on the upper floor, but there is no elevator.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to apologize that you didn't enjoy your stay with us. We appreciate the positive feedback you had to say. We do plan on doing some renovations to the outside. We look to earn your business in the future.

Summary: As others have mentioned, this place looks pretty plain from the street. However the rooms are clean, with modern furnishings and comfortable bedding. Shane and the rest of the staff couldn't have been friendlier. The convenient access to Crescent Bay Beach and use of the hotels beach chairs, and boogie boards were a big plus as well. I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a convenient and reasonable place to stay in Laguna beach.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay here with us. Very happy to hear we were friendly and accommodating to you on your stay with us. We welcome you back very soon.

Summary: A motel shell with a modern core: clean, great furniture, great TV set, modern bathroom. Romantic  (direct) access to Crescent cove. Great location: we walked to downtown Laguna. Windows of our rooms had a distant ocean view.  Nice personnel!
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for your stay here with us. We welcome you back on your next visit here to Laguna. So happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We will see you next time.

Summary Heading: Don't let the 'motel' like exterior fool you, this place is great!
Summary: Rooms are modern and remodelled, although the exterior may still look more like a cheaper motel.  Close to the beach and very friendly and helpful young staff.  Loved the little fire pit area, perfect for hanging out in the evening and having a few drinks.  Recommend taking a taxi to downtown Laguna.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our recently remodelled rooms, our close access to the beach and our fire pit area outside. Thank you for your kind words, we look forward to seeing you again in the future!

Summary: Clean, spacious, modern bathroom, few minutes walk to the beach! Partial view of the ocean is beautiful! Highly recommended for families. Great staff! We were originally booked at Hotel Laguna until the next morning we decided to move here because Hotel Laguna was a nightmare, dirty, no AC, outdated room and bathroom, ocean front is poorly maintained, elevator is falling apart, annoying valet service person. Crescent Bay Inn saved our stay!
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for your stay. Thank you for your kind words. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our staff, rooms and easy location to the beach. We look forward to your return! Thank you!

Summary: I don't know where the  good reviews for this hotel come from? The place looks nothing like the pictures online, it's run down,  if you don't get an ocean view you look out in an alley with more run down rooms across from you for your only view. Rooms that face  the street had missing guard rails and peeling paint. The price they charge is absolutely ridiculous, it would pay no more than $80!! The only good thing I can say is we got a full refund when we asked for it and left. The front desk person was very pleasant and understanding.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed upon your arrival to our Inn. We were doing some construction to our stairs in order to improve the safety for our guest, and plan on fixing up our exterior as soon as possible. We have completely remodeled the interior of our rooms, and we also provide FREE amenities to our guest such as water, soda, coffee, beach equipment, and wifi. I'm sorry to hear that our exterior was a deal breaker, and hopefully with some time and renovation we can have you back and change your mind about staying! Thank you for the review.

Summary: A partial view of the ocean from our rooms. Super easy access, straight down to the beach. Quaint set up. It was clean, they are in the process of remodeling some of rooms. Close to downtown Laguna,  I would recommend taking the trolley. Parking spaces are a little tight. Staff was welcoming and very accommodating.
Manager Response: On behalf of Crescent Bay we would like to thank you for staying with us. We are excited to hear that you found our team pleasant and helpful. We would also like to thank you for sharing your compliments with us, and hope to have the pleasure of serving you again. Once again, thank you for choosing Crescent Bay Inn, and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: At first glance driving by it probably would not have grabbed my attention.  However, once inside it is completely redecorated and modern.  Comfortable and spacious.  Parking is under all the room and rooms are all side by side.  Just a short walk to the beach.  Close to the action - on the trolley route.  Friendly staff and complimentary coffee, sodas, and waters.  Great sitting area with a fire pit and lots of plant life.  Great place to read or have a glass of wine.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn, we would like to thank you for your stay! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our recently remodeled rooms and close location to the beach, and let's not forget our free amenities! We thank you for your kind words, we look forward to seeing you again in the near future. Thank you!

Summary: Stylishly decorated and spotlessly clean large room with an ocean view .  It was a relaxing getaway for me and this was just perfect . A short walk to the cove and beach . The shops , art galleries and restaurants were also very accessible . Parking was covered ; the staff was very friendly and courteous . And water was complimentary ! I would definitely recommend the hotel and will be back soon !
Manager Response: That's amazing to hear your stay with us was comfortable and accommodating. We will see you on your next relaxing getaway. Looking forward to having you back here at the Crescent Bay Inn.

Summary: This was a great place to stay in Laguna Beach. Just about a mile away from all the action. The room is updated and clean and there is a nice private beach. Do not count on the breakfast though. We were offered a something like a Little Debbie and a bottle of water. :)
Manager Response: Very happy to hear you enjoyed the renovations we have made to our Inn. We welcome you back soon for your next visit. Unfortunately our breakfast in under renovations as well it will be up and going again though, sorry for the inconvenience.  Look forward to your next stay here with us.

Summary: We were pleasantly surprised by this quiet, comfortable inn that is just steps from a great beach. Josh was an attentive host and seemed to genuinely care about the quality of our stay. If you are looking for a more substantial breakfast, you will need to venture out, but Laguna has plenty of great places to go.
Manager Response: Very glad you had a comfortable stay here with us at our Inn. We will look forward to your next visit with us. See you next time you are in Laguna.

Summary: We enjoyed so much the stay that we added 3 more nights.  The rooms are confortable,  clean and nicely  furnished. The place is very  close to the beautiful Crescent Bay beach wich is just a few minutes walk down the road and not very crowded. Couldn't  ask for more for a relaxing vacation.  The staff is extremely nice and always willing to give helpful tips on what's going on in Laguna Beach and wich are the hot spots. We'll be back...
Manager Response: That's so wonderful you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to your return visit with us. I"m so glad that you had a great time with us here at Crescent Bay Inn. See you next time

Summary: Very pleasantly surprised by this gem of a hotel. We had Room 310, with a perfect view of the ocean. Shane was very friendly and accommodating, and the beach was just a few steps away. Oh, and the shower! I fell in love with that rain forest shower head. Will stay here again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your positive feedback. We really appreciate it. Please do come and visit us again in a heartbeat. We will be happy to accommodate you again. We will look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Very nice hotel up to date nice bathroom , great flatscreen tv and very comfortable bed. Only bad thing is road noise early in the AM , great room  price guys at the front desk were very friendly and accommodating overall a super spot to stay in Laguna !!!
Manager Response: So happy to hear your stay here at Crescent Bay Inn was overall good. We welcome you to come back a visit us again. We will look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The room was very nice and clean and the check in and out went smoothly. Our room #107 and was facing the Pacific Coast Highway which I thought may cause a problem but the traffic was not noticeable after 9:30 pm. The only problem with the room is that we could not get an internet connection. The breakfast was the normal items you would see at most hotels. The staff was very helpful!
Manager Response: We are very happy you enjoyed our rooms. We would love to have you back for your next stay in Laguna. Call us directly and we can make sure you have a room off the street. Looking forward to your next visit with us here at Crescent Bay Inn.

Summary: We booked here last minute on a little weekend getaway from LA. The staff could not have been more friendly. The room was clean, comfortable, and the price was totally fair. There is a gate out back that you can take down to a beautiful little cove. Can't say enough good things. We will be back.
Manager Response: Awesome! Sounds like your stay with us here was enjoyable. We will look forward to seeing you again next time you are in town. Very happy to hear that the beach access was a plus.

Summary: We stayed for two nights, small family with a toddler. The distance to the beach was just right--a short walk down a pathway with access to beach chairs. I wish that towels were also available as you headed down.   The rooms were great, Kreuger coffee maker, soda and water available for free all day in reception. Staff was amicable and gave us a short tour as soon as we arrived. There is a fire pit, a laundry room, and a breakfast room. Breakfast was good, nothing special but not bad either. Fresh waffle maker, cereals, fruits, yogurt.  The room came with a good sized tv. The fridge and microwave were placed in the bathroom however, which is awkward. They also do not mop up the bathroom during house keeping--which is weird because everyone who is coming to stay here is probably
Manager Response: Very happy to hear your stay with us was enjoyable and you will be coming back. That  means we will look forward to your return next time you and your family are in Laguna. Glad the rooms were appealing and the beach access was convenient for you. Looking forward to accommodating you again real soon.

Summary: Rough on the outside but fantastic on the inside. Room was comfy and decorated very moderne. Shower had an alternate rain forest nozzle - very nice.  Fire pit and chairs in a nook at the back, and just a few steps to the beach.  Our host was gracious and helpful. All and all a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Super excited to have you back for your next visit here to Crescent Bay Inn. Glad to here your time with us was enjoyable. Looking forward to accommodating you again real soon.

Summary: This motel has been nicely renovated.  The room was clean and modern.  We were in Room # 307, an ocean-view king.  Hopefully management will get the utility company to trim the bushes that block a lot of the view from the room.  We could still see the water from the right position and it was beautiful.  The staff were very helpful and friendly.  The location is perfect, a 5-min walk to the beach.  If you're looking for reasonably priced for ocean view, but don't care if it's an older motel, then this is the place.  They also offered a nice continental breakfast and great keurig coffee in the room.  We would stay again.
Manager Response: Very happy to hear that your stay here was enjoyable. We welcome you back next time you're in Laguna Beach. Looking forward to accommodating you again.

Summary: We were very well situated close to everything. Close to the beach, close to shopping, and close to dining. The room was very clean and comfortable. The staff was nice and easy to work with. The fire pit was a nice way to unwind before going to bed.
Manager Response: We are excited to have you as returning guests. We will look forward to your next visit with us. Thanks again for choosing Crescent Bay Inn.

Summary: This is an older motel but the room are clean and updated. The staff is very nice. They moved us to a new room when our toilet was having issues.  It's a quick 5 minute walk to Crescent Bay.  We'll definitely stay again next time we are in the area.
Manager Response: We are very happy you enjoyed your stay here with us. We are looking forward to your next stay. Glad the five minute walk to Crescent Bay was a winner for you all. We will see you again soon.

Summary: This is an older beach motel that has been nicely renovated in a very contemporary style.  The building sits directly on Pacific Coast Highway with the rooms facing an inside parking area.  Our room had no windows facing the street and remarkably, it was fairly quiet. Parallel parking was a bit of a chore and the stairs were pretty steep to our 2nd floor room, but the room itself is very nice. The room was freshly updated with a comfortable bed and good bedding.  The bathroom is very clean and contemporary with a nice, large shower.  Breakfast was very basic with packaged danish, yogurt, juice, cereal, coffee, tea and waffles.  Too many carbs and not enough protein for breakfast, I would recommend that they add hard boiled eggs or something similar to the menu.  Its not a very
Manager Response: We are happy you enjoyed our renovations and hope you will come back to see us again soon. We look forward to your next visit with us here at our modern Inn. Have safe travels

Summary Heading: Great place and very close to beach
Summary: Rooms are very contemporary and there is a easy path via behind the hotel to beach. Chairs and umbrellas were given as well. Staff was very friendly. Breakfast room was open all the time with snacks and juices.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at our Inn. Please come back and see us again. We appreciate the kind words you have left for us to respond back to. Glad to hear our beach access was convenient for you. We will see you next time.

Summary: This Inn is quaint and cute.  The young man in the front was quite welcoming and very hospitable. The beach is a beautiful 3-5 minute walk, through the welcoming streets and beautiful houses.   Laguna Beach also has a free trolley that takes guests from down the street from the Inn to the Ritz Carlton in Dana Point.  They have free refreshments when you walk into the lobby and a free continental breakfast.   There is also a patio area with a fire pit to sit and relax.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: So happy to hear we met your needs and you enjoyed our quaint little Inn. We look forward to having you come back. Thanks for enjoying our quick beach access path and leaving such kind words. We will see you on your next trip to Laguna Beach.

Summary Heading: Clean room, but noisy late night parties
Summary: Our room was clean, and the hotel is only a short walk to a beach, but the late night party did us in.  Shortly before 11 p.m. we called the desk to ask if the guests at the fire pit could be told to quiet down at 11.  Joshua agreed.  Then at midnight, when the party was still large and loud, my husband politely asked the partiers if they could quiet down.  When this still did not help, he called Josh again, and Josh said he would speak to them again.  This still did not help.  Even with our windows closed we could hear loud partiers.  This motel would only be a bargain if all guests were polite and if the management assumed responsibility for maintaining order.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed our rooms and our access which is just a short walk to the beach. We apologize for the loud partiers and assure you that our motel isn't a place to stay and party. Please come back and see us and we will make sure you enjoy your stay even more next time. Thank you.

Summary Heading: A brief overnight visit to beautiful Laguna Beach
Summary: The room was at the end of the 2nd visit, so no neighboring rooms; next to a small outdoor patio.  The room was small but well-furnished, including micro and a mini-fridge. Large TV and free wifi without a password, plus adequate storage and spacious bath with a great shower. Very clean, well-stocked, pleasant room odor and windows that opened to get a nice cross-breeze, plus air conditioner-heater-fan as well. The king size bed was very comfortable; slept like a baby! The only disappointment was breakfast room: waffles and cereals or pastries that are high sugar/carb content offerings, no protein (eggs or sausage), and bananas were way beyond ripe, so not healthy for diabetics like me. A little more thought and care in foods offered would be appreciated.
Manager Response: Our establishment is always aiming to make sure all of our guests are taken care of and happy to stay with us. To bring you back to stay with us again. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the rooms and the nice ocean breeze. Come back and see us again soon.

Summary Heading: Good value, very nice rooms, and great location
Summary: The room was very nice and looks recently updated.  We really liked how close the hotel is to the beach, just a short walk.  It was also just a 15 to 20 minute walk to many of the shops and restaurants in Laguna Beach - so great location.  The only thing we would have liked in the room was a floor length mirror.
Manager Response: Very happy to hear you enjoyed our beach access. It's great to hear you enjoyed it. Next time you come to Laguna we definitely welcome you back to stay with us. Thanks for leaving us the kind feedback.

Summary Heading: In town for daughter's engagement party.
Summary: Newly remodeled, clean, reasonably priced, friendly service, great location, quiet, and easy! My friends were worried when I told them I was staying there because they were unaware of the remodel job. This is a sleeper, and looks better than the rivals I checked.
Manager Response: Very happy you had a lovely wedding we welcome you back anytime you need a nice place to stay. We do appreciate you choosing to stay with us on such a special occasion. We will look forward for your returning visits.

Summary: Laguna Beach is beautiful, but expensive location, so this hotel was good value. It is located a few minutes walk from Crescent Beach, which is well worth a visit, particularly at sunset! You can also easily walk (about 10 minutes) to the main attractions in Laguna Beach or take the trolley bus that stops near the motel. The motel is fairly old, but has been extensively updated, including our room which was very clean, and quite comfortable. We were at the back of the motel, so we had a partial view of the ocean. The manager was very friendly and helpful. The free drinks (water, pop, & K-cups) available in the fridge located in the reception area was a nice touch. There are Keurig machines in reception and your room. Breakfast was included and was adequate. Outdoor lounge area
Manager Response: Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay here. We will be looking forward to your returning visit and we won't hesitate to put into action the things you mentioned. Thank you for the feedback and we will look forward to your return visit here with us.

Summary: The Crescent Bay is a nice motel even tough slightly overpriced (but it looks to me that every location is overpriced in the area). The bedroom looking to the sea are nice, whilst I fear the rooms towards the road could be extremely noisy. Personnel is extremely helpful and can give plenty of advice on the area.  Breakfast is poor for the price and the room where it is served is not super clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay with us here at the Crescent Bay Inn. We really want to see you again, so come visit us again soon. Our staff and establishment are happy to accommodate you.

Summary: My wife and I are travelling up the West Coast for our honeymoon and booking hotels as we go. We booked this on a bit of a whim mainly due to the price. I was so glad we did, the staff are very, very friendly and the room was a big surprise in its cleanliness and quality. However the best plus is the location to the beach, we probably walked it in less than 3 minutes. All in all a great little hotel and perfect location for Laguna and its beaches.
Manager Response: Wow so happy you enjoyed your stay here with us. Glad you liked our beach access we really would like to accommodate you again. Next time you decide to visit the West Coast. Come and see us again.

Summary: How do people who review on TA possibly rate this place 4 or 5 stars? They must be the ones who usually reside in pup tents. Or perhaps those that have reviewed only once and know no better.  When I called to make reservations their message comes on and there is no indication you have reached the hotel.  It puts you on hold and as there was no ID message I called back 3 times and just decided to wait to see if anyone picks up. When they finally did I said I'd like to speak to the manager.  He said he was the manager and when I told him my experience he ignored what I said and asked how can I help you?  Got to the hotel and it looked like an army barricks. No one was there.  Had to find the fellow who was running the place. Got the room card and went to the room. Wanted a drink
Manager Response: none

Summary: First time to stay here after coming to Lagun Beach for over 15 years.  We were nervous........Great people & staff and remodeled rooms! Like the free parlkimg, water, cokes and coffee!  They gave me a room that opened up just as we arrived.
Manager Response: That's really great you enjoyed your stay here with us. I'm happy to hear your visit back to Laguna Beach was a good one and we at the Crescent Bay Inn were able to make it a comfortable  stay. We welcome you back next time you decide to make a trip to Laguna.

Summary: I was under the impression the beach was a short walk down a trail  It is a short walk down the trail and then a couple blocks through a residential neighborhood.  The beach is land locked so you cannot walk to the next beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us here at the Crescent Bay Inn. Sorry to hear that the access to the beach was not as close as you had thought. Although our beaches are secluded and separated by rocks. They make for great adventuring if you ever are interested in seeing tide pools filled with sea life! We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Simple beauty.  The stairs up to the 2nd floor are a bear with heavy luggage, but that's my only MINOR complaint.  firepit with sitting area.  nice quiet walk to the beach between some beautiful well kept homes.  the owner let us borrow beach chairs and a boogie board for the surf!  can't say enough good things.   Will return soon.
Manager Response: So glad to hear you had a wonderful stay here at our lovely establishment. We are more than happy to help you with your luggage next time you come to visit us. Thank you for the kind words we do appreciate them. See you next time.

Summary: We stayed here for two nights in March. We arrived into LAX late on Saturday night and I called the hotel to make sure that we would have a room. When I told them I was calling to confirm my room, he said our name before I did and said they would be waiting for us. So nice! Our room had an ocean view and the beds were really comfy! We loved the access to the beach, and the short walk to the overview park. Kids really liked that we had a Keurig in the room. Breakfast was okay. Staff was really friendly. A great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review. We appreciate the positive feedback and welcome you back anytime you and your family are in Laguna Beach. See you again soon.

Summary: Pros: Great location and 5 minutes walk to a lovely and more secluded beach Comfortable room/nice bed Complimentary Breakfast Good Value Complimentary Soda/Bottled Water  Cons:  Housekeeping - For two days in a row I/my travel companion were at the room (around 10/11 when Maid passed by - I was about to leave both times and asked her to come by later and she didn't). Breakfast room was not well stocked: Did not have napkins, following day they had run out of bread etc... Further away from main area of town with restaurants, bars, etc
Manager Response: Thanks for the nice feedback. Glad you enjoyed your stay

Summary Heading: Phenomenal Place to Stay in Laguna Beach
Summary: I highly recommend staying here. You are treated like family (the family you like, lol) and the accommodations are better than most fancy hotels you have stayed in. We had an ocean view room and it was very nice. The staff (Shane and the other gentleman) are very welcoming and greet you by name. Shane is a great Christian guy and someone that you could be friends with. Breakfast was a nice touch as well. Waffles, toast, pastries, fresh fruit and juices and coffee... I'm probably leaving something out.   The beach, well, it doesn't get any better for a semi-private beach. It's really nice and it's mostly locals that are there. One day a seal hung out with us on the beach. We saw gray whales just in front of us blowing their spray. At low tide, the tide pools on the South side are
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the positive feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We welcome you back anytime.

Summary: Truly an awesome place to stay.  So pleased after our first two nights, we booked another two nights on the same trip.  Room was very clean, bed was extremely comfortable.  Easy beach access and chairs available to use.  Loved the quite evening by the fireplace on the patio.  The hospitality upon checkin, throughout the day and evening was amazing with Shane & Josh.
Manager Response: Thanks for the positive feedback we really appreciate it. We welcome you back anytime you're back in Laguna. We will look forward to accommodating you again.

Summary Heading: Clean room and well appointed. Friendly Staff.
Summary: We were here from Scottsdale for a wedding. Wanted a better room, however Spring Break didn't leave many options. Pricing was fair and room was clean and well appointed.  The front desk staff was very helpful and great to deal with.  We will book again.
Manager Response: Thanks for the positive feedback Steve we do appreciate it. We welcome you back anytime.  We look forward to being just as helpful and accommodating to you and your family.

Summary: Don't be deceived, outside looks uninspiring but inside is clean and modern with TV, fridge, coffee maker. Help yourself breakfast in separate guest room. Staff v friendly and helpful. Great location for Crescent Bay beach (easy walk, no steeper than usual beach accesses!).  Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Wow thanks for the positive feedback Mike we do appreciate it. We welcome you back anytime. The kind words are very appreciated. We try to make all of our guests comfortable here at our little quaint establishment.

Summary: Even though the curb appeal seems a bit down the rooms make up for, and so does the amazing view of the beach! The reason I gave it a 4 instead of a 5 is because of the little things. I am very picky so please only judge for yourself. The sheets did not quite fit the king sized bed and there were a couple of areas that were over looked during cleaning. Other than that the people were very friendly and nice. The view like I said was amazing! They had a fire pit little seating area that was cozy, and the hidden little path down to the beach was cute and awesome. The bed was amazing as well. The mattress was very comfortable as well as the covers and pillows. The A/C was great as well. They had a good enough range of channels as well. :)
Manager Response: Thanks for the positive feedback Sno. We appreciate the good review you left us. We welcome you back anytime. So please come see us again soon.

Summary: Omg super nice people Love it. Already booked for summer Private beach done secret garden path Swim with the seals n Pelicans  Nice buffet breakfast The staff was so nice and accommodating it was unbelievable that's what made the difference so nice but the inside is beautiful the private beach the fire pit and the staff makes the difference
Manager Response: We really appreciate the positive feedback Jeff. We will look forward to seeing you again this summer. Love to accommodate you and your family again. Thanks again for your kind words. See you soon Jeff.

Summary Heading: Clean, nice and a good value
Summary: Nice location and a quick <5 minute walk and your on the beach.  The breakfast that's include is fine but only the coffee and waffles are hot. The bathroom shower is large with an overhead option. The room was clean and nothing was "tired" or worn. You will find it a bit tight on space if you have two large suitcases.
Manager Response: Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay here with us Craig. We welcome you back whenever you're in Laguna Beach. Thank you for your positive feedback. We do appreciate it.

Summary Heading: Nicely remodelled but stay away from the road!
Summary: The staff were great, really friendly, helpful and accommodating when I mixed up the booking. The room was unexpectedly modern and tastefully decorated with good quality fittings and bathroom supplies, although I'm not sure a microwave and fridge belong there! Cereals,fruit, yoghurts, pastries, toast and a waffle machine are provided at breakfast - the room is open all the time, much appreciated as you can make coffee but not tea in the bedroom. Free parking and an easy walk to a fab beach. If you have a choice, don't stay in the rooms right on the PCH - a gap under the door made it incredibly noisy! But a great place to stay for a night or 2. Thanks guys!
Manager Response: Glad to hear that we were helpful with accommodating you Jane, the kurigs in the room do dispense hot water as well to make tea you just need to press brew without a k-cup inside. Come back again to visit us. Call directly to make sure your room isn't on the highway side.

Summary: The first night we had a room at the front of the building adjacent to the Pacific Coast Highway.  It was quite noisy and small.  We then upgraded to a room on 2nd floor of the third building which had a fine ocean view and was considerable bigger, big enough to have a small sofa and love seat in addition to king bed.  The mattresses are extra thick "pillow-top" and super comfy, and the shower is very large with super hot water.  From the back of the inn it is a short walk, 2 blocks, to Crescent Bay beach.   The only negative is that the Inn is located on the north edge of town so you will need to drive to everything or else walk along the busy PCH.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you enjoyed your a stay with us. We want to thank you for your positive feedback. We welcome you back to come stay with us. We would love to accommodate you again.

Summary Heading: Not a looker from the outside, but great place to stay
Summary: We did not realise Laguna is bisected by a busy road and were dismayed that the hotel was on it. However we had asked for ocean view room, and there are three buildings and the ocean view building is further eat away from the road. The buildings are plain, probably built in the 1960's, like most hotels around. However Our room was big, clean, with nice neutral new upholstery, fabulous comfortable bed etc. the bathroom was also new and clean. The windows are double glazed so, no noises to be heard from inside the room, though we had windows open. One thing we really appreciated was the temperature control - it did not get too hot around  midnight and then too cool around 4am. We find hotel air control usually too stuffy. It is a 15 minute walk approx into the main town. The walk
Manager Response: Happy to hear you enjoyed your stay here with us. Laguna Beach really is a great little city. We welcome you back anytime you decide to come back. Thank you for the positive feedback we do appreciate it. Please don't hesitate to come back and visit us.

Summary: I was so happy with the Crescent Bay Inn. It is very affordable. It's a short walk to Crescent Bay beach, which I preferred to the main beach in Laguna. The weekend trolley was convenient to get to. I walked to the main part of Laguna several times through Hiesler Park. It's a long walk, but very beautiful. The room was comfortable and clean. The staff was super friendly. The breakfast room was always open, which was important to me, since I wake up early. I was able to get coffee and a snack as soon as I woke up. I would definitely stay at Crescent Bay Inn if I go back to Laguna. It exceeded my expectations in every way.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations here at the Crescent Bay Inn. We do appreciate the positive feedback you gave us. When you do come back to Laguna Beach we will be more than happy to accommodate you again Lisa.

Summary: The rooms are so very nice. Everything updated.   The staff is terrific, so efficient and friendly. It is like you are among family. I would stay here again . Close to downtown and within walking distance to restaurants and shopping.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback Cherryl. We love to hear about how our guests enjoyed their stay here with us. Glad to hear you had a lovely time and liked the updated furnishings in our rooms. We aim to please and welcome you back next time you are in Laguna.

Summary: We were looking for an overnight stay prior to our Disneyland visit since we drove a couple hours. Crescent Bay inn popped up on our search and I read the reviews and all I can say is this hidden secret lives up to its expectations and its conveniently located by the beautiful beach in the very scenic laguna beach area surrounded by gorgeous breathtaking houses. The inn is very clean, updated with new modern furnishings and appliances. There is a microwave n medium sized fridge  in the room. The room is large and very comfortable. We loved the bed it was so soft and cozy. It's all about comfort. We were received by friendly staff at the lobby during check in and he was very helpful and informative. We definitely will come by again.
Manager Response: That makes us very happy that we are living up to our guests expectations. Glad to hear it was a comfortable stay. We welcome you back whenever you come to visit Laguna Beach again. Thank you for your positive feedback Maria.

Summary: From the street this property looks fairly basic but rest assured, the rooms are nicely updated. The staff, beyond friendly and accomodating. I stayed in 307 which is what is considered full ocean view, there is a nice view through lush vegetation with a small neighborhood between the Inn and the beach though. I'd call it more of an obstructed or partially obstructed view. But please do not let this scare you away, it's really nice, quiet and the sounds of birds from the trees is really relaxing and lovely. There was a nice sized hotel room fridge, microwave and Keurig in our room which was a nice touch.  Another huge plus here, FREE parking which is not the norm in Laguna.
Manager Response: Thanks for the positive feedback Tanya. We would love to have you come back and stay with us again next time you're in Laguna. Glad to hear you enjoyed your stay here with us.

Summary: All in all the boys enjoyed the hotel --- it was close to the ocean and they even walked into town.  At some point it was probably apartments turned into motel/hotel. But the rooms were modern decor and clean. Beds comfortable.  Boys loved the rain shower.  Had a small room where you get get coffee or orange juice or make a frozen waffle - nothing special but at least there was something. Location --- even though short walk to ocean you do need a car (free parking) to get anywhere since somewhat in-between all major areas.  Nothing really special but nothing really to complain about either! It is
