Manager Response: Glad to hear your stay here was adequate. Come to see us again when you are in Laguna. Thanks for the feedback and we will look forward to accommodating you again.

Summary: Only one night here. Welcomed warmly by the staff. Rooms are nicely renovated. Free water and sodas from the fridge. Breakfast is simple, as well as the breakfast room decoration, but who cares early in the morning. Only a 3 minute walk away from the little bay. And about a 15 min walk from the new Urth Caffe!
Manager Response: That's awesome we're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay here with us Syd. We welcome you back whenever you're here in Laguna Beach. Thanks for the positive feedback we do appreciate it.

Summary: We are actually not going until May. Spoke with Shane at the hotel and he was beyond helpful and friendly! So excited for our trip. Thanks Shane for going above and beyond helping with our reservation. The hotel is lucky to have you! The rooms look amazing and to have access to the beach is such a bonus. I am sure this will be our 1st of many trips to The Crescent Bay Inn!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the positive feedback Christine. We really hope your expectations are met above and beyond. We look forward to having you stay with us many more times in the future. Our establishment will always be welcoming to you.

Summary Heading: Charming hidden gem with spectacular service
Summary: Renovated rooms with modern furnishings, even a rain shower. Three minute walk down to a gorgeous small beach, walk or drive into adorable downtown Laguna. Incredibly helpful and understanding staff when I had issues with my corporate credit card. I can't wait to come back for a vacation vs. business trip!
Manager Response: So happy to hear that your stay with us here was enjoyable. We always enjoy hearing our guests enjoying their visits here at our beautiful establishment. Please come see us again when you are here on business or just come back for a little vacation.  We always look to be very accommodating in any way we can.

Summary Heading: Third time we have stayed here.......
Summary: Very nice rooms and a great walk to ocean shore!  Highly recommend staying here!  My husband loves to photograph at this spot.  We will be back!  Motel has parking under rooms and no second floor so "neighbor" noise is very limited! Makes more a quiet stay.
Manager Response: That's all great feedback. Thank you for the your positiveness. we will look forward to accommodating your and your husband next time Mary. Glad to hear you loved our little slice of paradise here in Laguna Beach.

Summary: The room design was the nicest of the lower-priced options along the coast. Contemporary furniture and amenities made the place feel clean and up to date. Make sure you request a room in the 300 building facing the water, The large oak tree outside your window makes the view and helps you feel like you are at a higher end property. Also, the trail down to Crescent Bay is a nice feature. Drinking coffee down on the beach in the morning was a real treat. Only big draw back is the hot-white LED bulbs in the room lamps. I'm bringing my own soft-white versions next time we stay.
Manager Response: Thank Chris for the compliments on our room design! We are thrilled to hear that your stay with us at the Crescent Bay Inn was a good one. We have definitely taken in your consideration as to changing our light bulbs to a softer white light and we greatly appreciate your input as we are constantly trying to improve the stay here for all of our guest. We hope to see you again soon, Thank you!

Summary: This past Valentine's Day Weekend in Laguna Beach was more than we expected it be. Want to thank the staff at Crescent Bay Inn for the fine customer service. Truly met our expections. Room 310 has an excellent ocean view and the motel is just a short comfortable walk to the beach. Make sure to catch the cities shuddle service just a few steps from the motel. Truly a restful and relaxing weekend. We will be back...
Manager Response: Wow so happy to hear that you enjoyed your Valentines Day weekend with us here at our establishment. We welcome you back next time you are in Laguna. Thank you for the positive feedback.

Summary: I am in the hotel and restaurant industry so I have an eye for detail and exceptional comfort.  THE ROOMS ARE AMAZING!  If you ever need to get-away or hide from the world, this little slice of heaven is the PLACE!  The walk to ocean from the property is nothing short of amazing leading up the breath taking views of the beach and ocean....  I GIVE 5 STARS *****
Manager Response: Hey Clint,   We appreciate the positive feedback brother. Whenever you are back please stop in and we'd be happy to accommodate you. We love to hear our guests enjoying their visit here at our establishment. It mean a lot.

Summary: Nice hotel but not for those with bad legs. Beach is down a long flight of stairs and there is no elevator to upper floors. Staff did help with luggage but still stairs to and from room. Beach was secluded and very clean. Complementary water and soda in lobby, light breakfast included. Beach chairs and bogie boars available at no charge.
Manager Response: We appreciate the review James. The stairs can be a a little much, we do welcome you back next time. We can assign you a floor level room, so you wouldn't have to walk up and down the stairs to your room.

Summary Heading: Good value for money and good location.
Summary: The room was nice, staff were friendly and helpful! The shower was excellent! No ocean view. Location was decent. The rooms were clean and updated and the bed was great.breakfast was ok only standard continental breakfast fare.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback. We welcome you back next time you're staying here in Laguna Beach.

Summary: The Inn looks dated from the outside but has been renovated and updated inside. Friendly staff and clean accommodations. Not on the beach but near it. A good place to stay if you are looking for an affordable, comfortable place to sleep and shower between outings.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We welcome you back next time you're passing through Laguna Beach.

Summary: laguna beachn isa beautiful place to stay. There are secluded coves, magnificient nature with sea lions on rocks, surfers, easy californian leaving, etc.... but then, to find a place that is so welcoming and friendly is an added bonus !  it is located a few steps up Crescent Bay Cove, which is a beautiful little beach. quite amazing to just take your towel and go to the beach, without having to drive. the building does not look much like anything , but the interior has been very tastefully redesigned in modern tones and furnitures. It is not big but the use of space is very smart and the amenities and just perfect : nice office desk with a second table that can be used for meals. fridge and microwave, very big vanity AND great and modern rain shower. So if you are lucky enough
Manager Response: That's so awesome to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. We are so happy to accommodate you with anything you need. Please remember to come back and visit us. We do appreciate your positive feedback.

Summary Heading: We felt like we were staying with family.
Summary: Shane and Josh are the best.  They made sure our needs were met.  We always saw big warm smiles.  Josh and Shane were always available for us.  We had an ocean view thanks to Shane.  The rooms were spotless and comfortable.  We will definitely return.
Manager Response: That's so great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It was my pleasure to make your stay with us enjoyable Debbie. Look forward for your next trip to Laguna. Thank you for your positive feedback.

Summary: We spent four nights at the Crescent Bay Inn recently. It is located on the Pacific Coast Highway on the north end of Laguna Beach. Beach access was via a path that goes straight from the hotel down the hill to Crescent Bay beach. Our hosts, two young hip California gents, were very welcoming, friendly and helpful. They fielded a host of questions about how to operate our TV, air conditioner, how to access Netflix, etc. They were always responsive and friendly. Our room had a modern, sleek feel, which was a bit of a surprise since the Inn is an older motel, probably built in the 60's. It was very clean and we had a nice view of the ocean. One nice amenity was the Keurig coffeemaker, with unlimited cartridges available in the main office. The breakfast was ok, with a waffle maker
Manager Response: We are glad to hear your stay with us was a relaxing and enjoyable one. Next time you're in Laguna stop on in and we will happily accommodate you. Thank you for the positive feedback Steve.

Summary: Nice place to stay in Laguna Beach. Staff genuinely seemed to care about my stay, and gave me good tips for things to do while I was there. Bed was very comfortable. Would have liked a tub and not just a shower, but the room was a good value for the price. It was possible to hear the highway a bit from my room, but it didn't bother me.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive feedback Rachel. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay here. We welcome you back next time you're in Laguna Beach.

Summary: Great value, location, and staff.  Not a luxury resort but a quaint place that is clean and within walking distance to a pretty secluded beach.  1 mile drive, walk, or trolley ride to the main Laguna strip with unlimited dining and beverage options.
Manager Response: Very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay here. We appreciate the positive feedback and would love to accomodate you in the near future.

Summary: When we drove up, I thought we made a mistake because the hotel looks pretty old from the outside, but the rooms have all been completely remodeled. They are very modern and clean. It comes with free beverages, free breakfast, free parking & free wifi. It is walking distance to the beach. You could probably walk to main beach, but it's about a mile away.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive feedback. We are happy to hear that your stay with us was enjoyable. We welcome you back anytime you're driving through or visiting.

Summary Heading: Good find in Laguna for a business trip
Summary: I travel to Orange County a few times a year and usually stay at one of the big corporate hotels in Irving - Marriott, Fairmont, Hilton, etc. This time, I knew I would have a little free time, and I wanted to be close to the beach. I searched TripAdvisor and found the Crescent Bay Inn. What an awesome find! It doesn't look like much from the outside, but don't be put off. The rooms have been updated and feel clean and modern. The TVs are all equipped with streaming services, and the wifi is free. There is daily breakfast also, which I did not take advantage of, but that is a part of the overall value for most people. Also, I found the staff very friendly and helpful. The bath amenities could be better, as they were not replaced at all during my stay, and the pillows are TINY,
Manager Response: Thank you Melissa for the positive review. We are happy you found us on Tripadvisor too. We welcome you back anytime you're here on business. Thanks for staying with us.

Summary Heading: excellent location. ocean view. excellent rooms. recently renovated with most impressive bathroom and vanity. great serv
Summary: could not be any better. it is beautifully located. renovated rooms, as good as a 4 star hote. designers bath and vanity. nice view. cozy location with very beautiful trail to beach. the main laguna beach park and commercial area with restaurant and boutique shops was less than a mile. about 5-8 minutes drive ( not walking distance ) but that was not problem as there is always relatively cheap parking there.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our cozy accommodations as well as the beautiful beaches and boutique shops near by. Thank you for your kind words and we hope to see you again during your next travels! Thank you.

Summary Heading: Not much to lok at, but enjoyed the stay
Summary: Room was great, location was just fine and the people very helpful. Location was a little out of the wa, but a short drive to the main beach was not too inconvenient. Outside of building looks a little shabby, but the room was updated and clean.
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay here with us at the Crescent Bay Inn! We do agree you can't judge us by our cover although we are working our hardest to make improvements to our exterior. We hope to see you again during your next travels here to Laguna Beach. Thank you!

Summary: Great location steps from the Crescent Bay in Laguna Beach make it very relaxing and enjoyable.  Clean rooms. Great customer service. Shane and Josh were very friendly and helpful. Will stay again Lord willing.
Manager Response: We're very pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay here with us; at our establishment. It is always a pleasure.Thank you for your positive feedback.

Summary: As we pulled up to the nondescript building, I was sure that I had misunderstood the Crescent Bay Inn website.  However, the receptionist began to dispel my doubts with her welcome and recitation of amenities.  They didn't all sink in at first, but after completing our two-night stay with our friends staying in another room, I rate it four stars in spite of outward appearances.  First of all, there're unlimited bottled water and selection of soft refrigerated drinks in the lobby.  There's a beautiful, uncrowded beach a short block and a half away, and the hotel offers plenty of beach chairs, umbrellas, and towels for its guests.  Although there's no designated concierge, both managers and the receptionists gave us some great suggestions for restaurants and hiking in public parks
Manager Response: We're happy to hear you ended up enjoying your stay with us. Our establishment is always here for you when you're in Laguna.  Hope you and your friends have a wonderful year. Appreciate the positive feedback.

Summary: Awesome for a relaxed road trip or beach vacation. Just what you need, nothing too fancy, but perfectly clean, good service and great location. Room size was also appropriate. The location is perfect, as it is in Laguna but pretty close to Newport beach.
Manager Response: So happy to hear that you enjoyed your vacation here. Please come back to visit next time you're in Laguna. Thank you for the positive feedback.

Summary: First night we did not get the room we requested on the ground floor, so my Mother and I had to share a bed. Finally our 2 Queens ground floor room was ready the next day.  It was OK, but not great. Carpet was coming off the carpet strip and I stepped on carpet tacks multiple times which was very painful. My Mom is a senior and it was very cumbersome to get shower set for her without getting soaked. Also did not have much hot water. Saw several bugs in the bathroom tiled area too. Only a couple of coat hangers were in the closet. Breakfast was OK. Mom liked the waffles, but most of the time they stuck to the waffle iron because no cooking spray was available to use. I am Lifetime Platinum with Marriott and chose to stay here as it was close to our family's house and I did not
Manager Response: So sorry we didn't have the room you requested. Those complaints were dealt with, thank you for letting us know Sherry. Crescent Bay Inn is always a convenient hotel to stay while in Laguna beach.

Summary: Great location close to all the galleries and shops. Very short walk to the beach where one can explore the tidepools. Comfortable beds. Great shower. Looks like the rooms were recently renovated. Large flat screen TV with netflix. ( Could use a separate netflix remote, as we were unable to find a "search" fxn on the regular remote). Complementary water and sodas. The only negative are the thin walls, but that is true for most hotels we stay in. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for your stay! We could not agree more on how convenient it is to explore Laguna Beach from our location especially the tidepools! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our rooms and our amenities. Thank you for your kind review and recommendation, we hope to accommodate you in the near future! Thank you

Summary: Hotel front desk staff was very friendly and showed us where everything is. We had a great one night stay in Crescent Bay Inn. The room was clean and there was a big TV with Netflix movies and TV series for free. You could also choose Amazon and pay for certain movies of your choices. Also have to mention that the beach is a 2 minutes walk from back of the hotel which is amazing! Room was very clean with essentials. The water from the shower-head was gentle and quite.  Only thing I found weird is that the microwave and fridge are inside the restroom area. They were opposite to the sink counter so not too close from the toilette and shower, however if you close the door then they are inside... they could improve the design and put these outside. But overall, I would recommend
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn! We are thrilled to hear that your one night stay here with us was a great one! We do try our best to be as helpful as possible. We are glad you enjoyed our TV and entertainment options as well as the easy 2 minute access to Crescent Bay Beach. We are currently working on a better solution as to location for our refrigerator and microwaves in some of our rooms. Thank you for your recommendation and taking the time to write us about your stay! We hope yo see you again in the near future. Thank you!

Summary: Loved the rain shower head and Netflix on the flatscreen tv. Also the complimentry sodas and the fire pit area for relaxing was a nice plus. The rooms have been recently renovated and continental breakfast and free parking is included.
Manager Response: Thanks you for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed all of our amenities and the rain shower inside the room, as it is one of our favorite amenities too. We hope to see you again during your next trip here to Laguna Beach, Thank you!

Summary: Recently stayed at the crescent bay inn. Great location, very close to the beach. Normal continental breakfast. Right next to a free trolley stop to get downtown. The parking situation isn't the greatest for larger vehicles but it worked and it was free. I would come back again!
Manager Response: Thanks for your stay with us here at Crescent Bay Inn. We appreciate the positive feedback and look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Our room was spacious and updated. Loved the rainfall shower. Great ocean view from our room. The staff was very nice and helpful. Continental breakfast room was nice and well stocked. Really close to shops and restaurants. I would definitely stay here again on my next trip to Laguna.
Manager Response: Wow that's great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate the positive feedback and look forward to housing you next time you're in Laguna.

Summary Heading: Good value for pricey Laguna, rooms remodeled,free parking
Summary: We stayed here for Thanksgiving for a short get-away.  It doesn't look like much from the outside, but the rooms have all been updated nicely--great showers, good beds, nice fridge and microwave. If you want an ocean view room that is not up against noisy PCHwy go for the 300 numbered rooms, except 301. Since the property is on a hill some of the rooms off the highway have an ocean view. We booked an ocean view room and they initially tried to put us in one of those rooms, but changed us to 305 when we balked.  Here are the pros:  excellent location for walking down to a nice, quiet beach. Parking is free (a big plus in Laguna).  They are generous with bottled waters, Cokes, etc. We didn't try the breakfast, but loved the Keurig coffee in our room. There is a nice outdoor fire
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us here at Crescent Bay Inn. We appreciate the positive feedback. Come back and see us anytime. Glad you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: The hospitality was wonderful, and we really enjoyed sitting out at the fire in the evening.  Location was great as well and room was very nice. So why we would give a 4 for this one but we were really hoping for a better breakfast. Definitely limited so we ended up eating somewhere else shortly after leaving. But all in all we would stay there again for the hospitality and location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay here at Crescent Bay Inn. We appreciate your positive feedback. Come see us again next time you're in Laguna.

Summary: Rooms were nicely decorated, clean& large.   The pillows were too big & lumpy, but the mattress was great. Breakfast was so so but then I'm picky - I don't like plastic wrapped pastry.  Short walk to a beautiful beach.  Oh yea TV very limited but  I guess I'm okay with a few days of no news or sports but not so much my husband
Manager Response: We here at the Crescent Bay Inn thank you for staying with us and are happy to hear you enjoyed our room and mattress. We hope to see you again next time you decide to travel back to Laguna Beach! Thank you.

Summary: Staff was very friendly, room was nice and clean for the most part. The microwave tray needed to be wiped down.  My only gripe was their cable setup or lack of it.  You have to "search" for available channels resulting in finding only 6 stations and since we stayed here for Thanksgiving there was no football to watch.  Kind of a bummer but there is a Netflix and Amazon option so you can find other stuff to watch.  Please just add regular cable and this place gets a 5 star rating.
Manager Response: We here at the Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for staying with us.  We appreciate your kind words and you taking the time to give us feedback as we are constantly making improvements to better the environment for our guests. We are sorry for the inconvenience while we lack the channels at the moment. We are currently improving our entertainment setup. We are very happy to hear you enjoyed the Crescent Bay Inn and its staff and we hope to see you in the near future. Thank you!

Summary: We stayed here while visiting the Laguna Beach area. The rooms are quite large with very nice decor. Shane at the front desk was spot on with his recommendations of local eateries. Beds are VERY comfortable. Just a short walk to the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn during your visit here to Laguna Beach! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our rooms and our comfortable beds. We are glad that we were able to assist you with finding places to eat! We hope to see you again next time you visit! Thank you.

Summary: The hotel was a good value and comfortable stay.  Front desk staff were very helpful and welcoming. It is a short walk down the hill to Crescent Bay. If you want to go downtown or to pedestrian walkway along main beach, it is a short drive.  Lots of work has been done on the hotel to spruce it up, with improvements still being made. Did not sample the breakfast.  Stayed in middle building which was quiet. Room was clean, modern and had all necessary amenities. The pillows were a bit lumpy and one part of the floor seemed a bit saggy, but nothing major.
Manager Response: We here at the Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for your stay. We are glad to hear you enjoyed the rooms and easy access to the beach. Thank your for your compliments about our property and we can't wait to make more improvements! Hope to see you again in your future travels! Thank you.

Summary: We were there November 7-8. Fabulous and very helpful staff, great rooms, very clean and welcoming. The two guys in the front office were so helpful with everything! The short walk to the beach was great...especially since I'm in Idaho and the weather less than welcoming! We're looking forward to coming back!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn. We are always more than happy to go out of our way to be helpful and welcoming during your stay here at Laguna Beach! We look forward to your return. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Nice inn close to the beach
Summary: Short walk to the beach, but a bit far from downtown. Service was great! Shane at the front desk was awesome! Breakfast was nice. The rooms seem recently renovated, the shower head is awesome! But the walls are a bit too thin, so we heard our neighbors noisy kids, and their loud TV.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our recently renovated rooms as well as our easy access to the beach. We couldn't agree more that our showers are awesome! We hope to see you again next time you choose to travel to Laguna Beach. Thank you!

Summary: The manager was very friendly and created cheerful mood; excellent. I believe the price is a bit too high, since the rooms have no sea view. However, its only a short walk to the Crescent Bay which is beautiful. It is a motel. Breakfast is included. Great. The breakfast room is basic, it serves the purposes.
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn Would like to thank you for your stay. We are happy to hear that you felt the good vibes and enjoyed the beautiful short walk to the beach. We hope to see you during your next trip down here to Laguna Beach. Thank you!

Summary: A great getaway looonggg weekend with no hassles and the simplicity of a beach house. People who work at CBI are helpful, happy and relaxed. Rooms are great and location to everything great is great. The beach 3 min from Inn is fantastic and if you cant get your mind right there in the am you cant get it right anyplace. Thanks and see you next time!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn as your place for lodging! We are happy to hear that we provided a relaxed and cheerful surrounding during your stay here with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our rooms and easy access to the beach as well. We look forward to your return! Thank you.

Summary: Friendly service.  Easy check I and parking.  Very nice short walk to the beach.  Trolley great for going out at night.  Room nicely updated.  I would recommend the hotel to friends and I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us here at the Crescent Bay Inn. We are glad to hear you took advantage of the trolley Laguna Beach has to offer, it's a great way to get around town! We are glad you enjoyed the rooms and thank your for the recommendation! We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Nice Accommodations close to the Beach
Summary: Not sure what the money to value ratio is as I don't know any of the other Laguna Beach properties, so I'll just elaborate on the positives and a few things to note.  The rooms are very nice and updated; bathrooms are fairly large and clean with rain showers. Staff is extremely nice and helpful, particularly Josh and Shane.  Water, coffee and snacks are available all day. Views from the higher priced rooms are great.  Beautiful Crescent Bay Beach is only a short walk away.  There is an outdoor sitting area with a fire pit and a shower to rinse off after a walk on the beach. Drawbacks are that the hotel is close to Highway 1, so it is a little loud.  Breakfast is average, but there are a couple of great European bakeries in town where you can grab a pastry. Walls are a little
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback we do appreciate it. We hope to accommodate you again soon. Glad you enjoyed your stay here with us.

Summary: An older place but rooms were wonderful. Outstanding service and lovely path to private cove beach were more than worth it. Biggest negative was ambient noise of people walking by your room ... also it was one of the more expensive places we stayed. But in Laguna Beach, still probably a bargain.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay with us, we would love to have you back.

Summary Heading: Superb location, fantastic complimentary breakfast, smart rooms!
Summary: Staff: Hotel staff on reception and maids were exceptionally friendly and helpful. Reception staff were faultless  in helping me book taxis and use their phone.  Complimentary drinks and coffee were offered upon check in and it was made clear that I was welcome to drop in any time throughout my visit to grab a drink.   Services: Complimentary breakfast was a nice surprise and definitely amazing value. Free coffee, tea, fruit juices, cereals, bagels, toast, waffles, yoghurts and fruit is definitely not to be missed(!!). The hotel offers free use of wifi in the room, and provides free loan of beach chairs and umbrellas for the beach.  Rooms: The rooms have apparently been re-done recently; very comfortable, smart and clean. The monsoon shower and generous sink are a massive bonus
Manager Response: Wow! We really appreciate the time you took to write us such a positive review. We would love to accommodate you all in the future. So anytime you all come back to Laguna stop on in and we'd love to assist you.

Summary: I decided to stay here after reading all the positive reviews on this property. I was completely satisfied with every aspect of my stay. Josh and Hershel are great hosts and good people. Stay here and enjoy wonderful Laguna Beach!
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and positive feedback. Come back again soon.

Summary Heading: This was a great place to stay
Summary: The staff was awesome,and so was the location, just a short walk to the beach.  I would recommend this place to friends and I will stay here again! The staff really took care of our requests and they did a great job keeping the place clean.  A few blocks away was a great store; you could buy 3 for $10 salads and whole chickens for $6, this helped keep cost down in expensive Laguna.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive feedback. Glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We will be getting new bodyboards soon. Hope to accommodate you again soon.

Summary: We had a room closest to the ocean, which was very nice.  Room and bed were comfortable with an ocean view. However, some of the rooms closer to the road (PCH 1) may be noisy at night.  Staff were very helpful.  Close walk to a very nice beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the positive feedback and the fact you enjoyed your stay here with us.

Summary: You hardly notice the place, i drove right by.  The owner made upgrades to the rooms rather than the building.  New sink, shower, and nice thick towels. Wide screen tv microwave and fridge.  Nice clean, comfortable room. Short walk to ocean. Anthing i needed i just asked, such nice personable staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate the positive feedback and look forward to accommodating you again.

Summary: We had a premium room to avoid the highway noise and we noticed none. I think most rooms aren't on the highway but I'd hate to get one. We thoroughly enjoyed the convenience and price of staying there. We had just come from Disneyland and this place had everything we needed to relax.  - Comfortable Room - Free Water and drinks (after Disneyland this is a huge freebie) - Free Breakfast and snacks (you could even grab snacks from breakfast after it closed usually) - Short walk to beach - Borrow their beach chairs, toys, boogie boards towels etc (because you don't own and couldn't take those on the plane if you wanted to) - Walking distance to decent food (Loved the House Special Chicken at the local chinese place and Gina's Pizza was good) - Free Wifi (In the evenings it could get
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us here at the Crescent Bay Inn! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations as well as all the local activities and places to eat nearby. We are working on getting a much larger selection of channels for all of our guest. We hope to see you again during your next travels to Laguna Beach! Thank you for your kind words.

Summary: located in the heart of laguna beach a very comfortable hotel with very nice and clean rooms. the staff is amazing and willing to help at any time of day. it has an amazing view of the ocean. and staying there made me in particular feel like home.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn. We are so happy to hear that your enjoyed your room and your view. Nothing makes us happier though to hear that you felt like you were at home. We look forward to accommodating you again in the future. Thank you!

Summary: The Creacent Bay Inn is awesome! Josh at the front desk was very helpful and friendly. The moment we got there we felt welcome, Josh gave us complementary upgrade to a waterfront and that made are stay even better! The room was perfect and if we needed anything they took care of us. Me and my girlfriend were very thankful! Also brownie points to Josh for recommending that awesome restaurant The Cliff! We will be back and hopefully soon! Thank you :)
Manager Response: Thank your for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn. We are so glad to hear that you and your girlfriend had an amazing stay with us. We do our absolute best to make sure our guest leave here with unforgettable memories and happy faces. We really look forward to your return. Thank you!

Summary: At a glance there is nothing special or impressive about the exterior of this inn. However once we checked in, met the manager and saw our room i was convinced. This place is a hidden treasure. It is literally 2 mins from the beach and thats a slow stroll. The local free trolly will take you a mile into shopping and dining areas. The room was clean and modern. The shower is an awesome rain shower. I will definately come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn! We are thrilled to hear that you stumbled upon our hidden treasure, one that we are more than happy to share with you. We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed and took advantage of our easy beach access pathway as well as our rooms. We look forward to accommodating you again. Thank you!

Summary: This is not in centre of town but near enough to access everything.  It is a motel and has a motel feel to it.  Rooms and bed are very comfortable and well designed. The breakfast here is pretty abysmal.  Quality is poor but at least the coffee is hot. Some rooms on the highway I imagine would be noisy.  Ours was on the second row and we had no problem with noise.  Friendly staff and a nice beach at your back door.  The place has a functional feel to it so its more suited to a short break.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed in several large Hotels but they cannot compare to the Crescent Bay Inn. The staff went out of their way to accommodate any request.  The rooms were clean and the location was perfect.  Another plus was free parking.  We look forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for your stay. Thank you for your kind words. We are thrilled to hear that we were able to accommodate you with any request as we strive to make every guest feel as if they were at home. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our rooms and easy location. We look forward to your return! Thank you!

Summary: The small staff at Crescent Bay Inn felt like family that actually cares. On our last night there my mother came to visit, she lives in Anaheim. Herschel lit the gas bonfire for us and gave us a bottle of wine. The two general managers look like classic surfer dudes. They are both sharp and on top of any problem that comes up. The rooms are modern and comfortable. We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean and close to the beach
Summary: Took a chance in staying here, and I'm glad I did. I found the room to be very clean, wtih some nice upgrades, such as: fridge, microwave, nice flat screen tv, rain shower, etc... I stayed on the street level in front of the PCH. The road noise was noticeable, but not so much so that I couldnt sleep. Next time I would opt for a room on the other side of the motel. Free parking and wi-fi, plus coffee/soda, and continental breakfast included (though I didn't try it). I would recommend this place in a second. Btw, check-out was at 11am, which I did think was a bit too early.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Cool cool cool !!! Managers are super friendly, a wonderful beach just few steps ahead... Must go !!! I swam with seals and sea lions, you can walk along the beach and find beautiful mini creeks over the rocks. Love it !!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Amazing renovation completes in 2015. The rooms are beautiful and it's a block from the beach. There's a trail at the rear of the property leading to the best beach in Laguna... beautiful view and no no rocks like the most of the surrounding beaches.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: last minute trip for family birthday
Summary: We had a great time. Place is as advertised by many others - doesn't look like much on outside, but interior of rooms, location, and staff helpfulness are hard to beat. They offer as much cold water and soda as you need - I felt bad taking so much. 5 minute walk to a beautiful beach with minimal crowds, good use of beach chairs and boogie boards, but couldn't find any sand toys for kids - didn't really ask them, and kids did fine just being in the water. Hershel was welcoming and kind - extremely helpful. Was everything we needed for a last minute getaway. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay here at Crescent Bay was wonderful! Shane made the stay a wonderful experience! So personalable, kind and friendly. Along with the rest of the staff members. I was beyond pleased with the hotel, staff and amenities!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Every need we had was met with gracious, kind hospitality.  Check in was a breeze.  It was an extremely hot day and water was offered immediately, which was greatly needed and appreciated.  In addition, the information about the town helped us make our stay wonderful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was quaint and cozy. Newly remodeled. We had a quick getaway for the weekend. There is a walkway to the beach which we really enjoyed. There is a complimentary breakfast room that has juice, cereal, yogurt, waffles. It was awesome enjoyed my waffle. But I must say that the staff was awesome! So friendly and helpful he was just all around nice guy!  We will be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a great two night stay here. The somewhat private beach was less than a minute walk and the walkway paths between the homes is pretty cool. We were one block away from the beginning of the Heisler Park trail which was amazing to walk by day and night. The staff remembered our names and greeted us every time we passed the lobby. At first site the laundry stacked up in piles outside the door in the front is like what have I gotten myself into, but our experience was so great that didn't matter to us. Our room was a King that had been updated had fridge, microwave, flat screen, couch with sitting area,  and the glass shower had a rainmaker and regular shower head. The value you get for the money at the place is second to none. Thanks for a great experience!
Manager Response: none

Summary: overall the hotel has great service, great location, is nicely renovated and offers nice amentities (beach equipment that is actually nice, clean and usable, complimentary breakfast/soda/coffee and onsite parking). downside is the hotel is on main road and rooms facing the road are quite noisy. as other reviews have stated, you cant judge a book by its cover--the outside is rundown however the newly renovated rooms are modern and clean
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family's 3 night stay here couldn't have been better! Don't be turned off by the exterior - the rooms are updated and extremely clean ! We had a double queen room- the room is a bit small but we spent very little time in it anyway. The owner and entire staff are extremely accommodating and friendly. There is a small breakfast room with cereal, waffles, coffee etc... They allow you to use beach chairs, boogie boards and umbrellas as well. The best part is the short walk to one of the most beautiful beaches I've seen ! The price for such an amazing location cannot be beat! My whole family agrees that if given the opportunity we would love to stay at this property again in the future ! We are so happy that we didn't have to pay top dollar to enjoy this beautiful beach town!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms are refurbished and have air conditioning and staff is great, very welcoming and accommodating. Shower and vanity area are very nice, and updated. Parking may be limited. The exterior may be a bit off putting but the rooms totally met our needs.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There's something about Crescent Bay Inn that gives you a nice, warm feeling and draws you to it. This is not the fanciest hotel but certainly one of the most memorable ones I've been to. Herschel, Shane, and Josh treats you, not as a guest, but as a friend. It has access to a lovely, secluded beach. The beach is so pretty that you don't desire to go anywhere else but this beach. It has a patio where you can hangout with other guests. The rooms are immaculately clean, tastefully decorated and we had a gorgeous view of the ocean! Parking and breakfast was free, you can borrow beach chairs, toys, and umbrella, what more can you ask for from this cute hotel? I will definitely be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Breakfast were included - did not mention in booking ? I can strongly recommend. Clean and nice rooms, a few minutes away from the beach. Great - thank you !!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive feedback. Come stay with us again soon.

Summary: Our stay at Crescent Bay Inn was very good. The room was clean and had a nice interior. We were able to see the ocean. This Inn has an access to the beach (3 minute walk) and offers towels and several beach accessories. Soft drinks and coffee were available for free. Free parking. The breakfast was not that good (no fruits, just sweat things and compared to the rest of the Inn a little pure). Beside this fact we would stay here again and would fully recommend it.
Manager Response: We appreciate the time you took to write us a positive review. Glad you enjoyed your stay with us. Look forward to accommodating you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great hotel, friendly staff, close to beach!
Summary: The hotel was clean, comfortable, and a short 3 min walk to the beach. The staff was incredibly helpful and friendly! The staff (Josh and Shane) were so incredibly friendly to our four-year-old that she talked about them the entire way home. They took the time to give us directions and advice, and chatted with our child to her hearts content. I've truly never stayed at a more friendly hotel. The beds were comfy and the rooms incredibly clean. Location was great - 3 mins to a beautiful beach and 1/2 block to the trolley stop. So convenient. Breakfast was "ok", but everything else made up for it. Will definitely stay again!!!
Manager Response: Aw thank you so much for all the positive feedback, it means a lot. We look forward to accommodating you all when you are back in Laguna. Glad it was a great trip!

Summary: What a great experience on our first night of a two week trip up the PCH. We had a late check in with an online booking. We were greeted by Shane from the front desk who was extremely helpful after a long day of travelling and traffic. The facility is vintage and the rooms are clean and beachy but not posh. What matters here is the location - just a short walk to catch sunset on the sand. And don't miss a short walk to spectacular views of Crescent Bay from Point Park. Parking and breakfast are included so this is a value for the price. The manager was nice enough to talk about the history of this area and his inn when I checked out. I recommend the Crescent Bay Inn and would stay here again.
Manager Response: So happy you enjoyed your stay here with us. We hope we can be as accommodating in the near future for your next stay with us. Thanks for the positive feedback.

Summary: Straight from the arrival we felt very welcome in this hotel. Easy going staf, nice clean room, beautiful view, close to the beach, plenty of free parking space. We did not need more. It would have been perfect stay if the aircondition unit was a bit less noisy.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and will look forward to accommodating you again soon.

Summary: We loved our stay at Crescent Bay Inn.  We had an ocean view in a very comfortable room that has been updated and nicely furnished.  The entire staff was friendly and helpful.  The owner has made free water, soda and coffee available in the front office, as well as some beach chairs and umbrellas.  The free breakfast in convenient.  We enjoyed getting to know the front desk staff very much.  These young men are personable and caring individuals with great attitudes. It is a quiet location with a beautiful beach that is just a short walk away.  Also, a short walk away is a small park that overlooks Seal Rock.  A great spot for photos. We will definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Wow! So glad to hear all the positive things you had to say about your trip. Thank you for the review, look forward to seeing you next time you all are in Laguna Beach.

Summary: Our stay in Laguna Beach couldn't have been more perfect and the Crescent Bay Inn was a big reason why. From the moment we stepped onto the property we were treated like family. Herchell, Josh, Shane and the rest of the staff were extremely accommodating the entire trip from checking us into our room early the day of our arrival, to greeting us warmly everytime we ran into them during our stay (even offering to take us snorkeling and lending us goggles so we could see all the cool fish in the reef at the local beach), to offering free waters, sodas and a continental breakfast, and finally extending our check out time on the day of our departure, they were always there to make sure we were taken care of. Also, the location is perfect. A two minute walk to one of the best beaches
Manager Response: That's wonderful! Super happy you all enjoyed your stay with us. Hope we can accommodate you guys again. We do appreciate the positive feedback.

Summary Heading: Pay a little more for a better experience...
Summary: We chose this hotel based on other reviews and its relative value. We really felt that others must have had a different experience than ours. I will say that the rooms were clean and recently remodeled.  That being said - our room faced Pacific Coast Highway, and the door didn't have proper insulation. There was a huge gap at the bottom of the door.  The street noise was overwhelming. The water pressure in the shower was non existent. It barely dribbled out enough to get clean.  And finally the pillow situation was laughable. There were two huge decorative pillows that looked nice, yet we were given two little tiny sleeping pillows that had to be stuffed into the end of their covers to provide any form.  I don't know that I can complaint about this feature - but our room had a
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us your review.

Summary: Room was ready early. Very nice room. Nice and quiet. Spent the day at the beach, just a quick two minute walk. Beach was beautiful. Hotel provided towels, chairs, umbrellas, boogie boards for us. Breakfast was great. Coffee, pastry, bagels and make your own waffles! Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for staying with us. We are glad you enjoyed your stay and look forward to the next time travels brings you this way! Thank You!

Summary: Don't believe any of the photos!  Unfortunately, we did & our view is the back of a bush on the 1st floor, on the street.  It sounds like a racetrack in the room due to all the traffic, especially very loud motorcycles.  Also, you can hear people walking around upstairs. Very disappointing!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our recent stay at Crescent Bay Inn.  You can easily walk to the beach and get to the downtown area via a free shuttle. We didn't have a car on our stay and found it easy to get around (very walk friendly). The staff were wonderful and very helpful with recommendations. You felt right at home with them and part of their community. We enjoyed our experience and would stay here again.
Manager Response: We at the Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for staying with us. We like to make our guests feel as comfortable as possible to make their experience great! We are happy to hear that you had a great stay and we look forward to seeing you again in the future. Thank you!

Summary: Crescent Bay Inn is a great place to stay. No complaints, we will definitely stay here again. Staff is fantastic, nice rooms, easy walk to the beach. It's on the good side of the PCH. You can pay twice as much to be in the heart of Laguna but it isn't worth it. The beach is great for swimming, body surfing, snorkeling, or just relaxing. Oh yeah, tide pools too. Only complaint about the room would be the couch is not comfortable to sit on for any length of time.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay. We are glad that you enjoyed our comfortable rooms, easy beach access and staff. We couldn't agree more that exploring the tide pools and snorkeling at our local beach is great! We look forward to the next time you return. Thank You!

Summary: Friendly staff, nice and clean room 2 minute walk to a beautiful beach Free parking and wifi (some wifi problems in rush hours around 10 pm) Freebies, beach stuff chairs, boards,... Do not judge by the exterior
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for your stay. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit with us as well as our staff and the amenities that we have to offer. Hope to see you again if your travels bring you down this way! Thank you.

Summary: Absolutely worth it's money and even better!  Staff is great and friendly and everything here has south California spirit.   Rooms are completely renewed with gray contemporary interior. The exterior could be better but the guys told they are waiting for city permit to remodel it. So don't judge by the exterior take a look at the rooms :)
Manager Response: On Behalf of Crescent Bay Inn we'd like to thank you for staying with us. We are thrilled to hear you felt the South OC spirit and enjoyed our rooms! We hope to see you in the future. Thank you!

Summary: We stayed for one night en route from San Diego to LA. I booked it having researched hotels in Laguna Beach on Trip Advisor and couldn't have been more delighted. As other reviewers have said, the outside is not attractive but the interior is very stylish and the young man on reception was extremely helpful and friendly. I understand it is a family owned/run hotel which makes a nice change too to the big chains. Rooms are a good size and the shower was excellent. A big perk was the fridge full of soft drinks and water in the reception area which guests can help themselves to and also a free breakfast. It was only a short stroll to the beach for a dip in the sea. Just over the road from the hotel is a handy Seven Eleven and we caught the free trolley into town for our evening
Manager Response: On Behalf of Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you very much for staying with us recently. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our rooms as well as our amenities. We couldn't agree more that the close walk to the beach and store is very convenient.Thank you so much for your kind words. Thank you for your kind words and we hope to see you again next time you travel to Laguna Beach!

Summary: Pleasant surprise upon arrival. Unassuming outside appearance but rooms very tastefully & stylishly done. Super fresh with huge bathroom. Free water, soda & breakfast. There's even a do-it-yourself waffle maker! Steps to beach & outside seating area with a fire pit. Josh & Shane will stun you with their "twin-like" looks!
Manager Response: We appreciate the positive feedback. Thanks for choosing us as your place to stay. We invite you back next time you're in Laguna.

Summary: From start to finish the Crescent Bay Inn was exceptional. Beyond expectation in all departments, check in was very welcoming and Shane took us to our room, answered all questions as well as giving us the low down on restaurants and bars. The room was very clean and modern, bed was large and comfortable with great linens. Bathroom was large modern with a great shower, just what you need when you come off the beach! The beach is really two minutes away and is truly beautiful, be sure to make the most of the Inn's complimentary beach chairs and cold drinks. I have stayed in many large chain hotels on the west coast and this small independent one has really impressed me and can't wait to visit again. Crescent Bay Inn staff thank you for a great short break in the very beautiful
Manager Response: none

Summary: Check in was smooth.. Shane was awesome and very accomodating. He took us on a tour of the grounds. There is a laundry room with an ice machine. (no vending for soap or otherwise but there are convenient stores across the street to the right of the property).Theres a private walkway for access to the beach and the park. Stairs to the park are to your right on the way to the beach (from the street). There is also free continental breakfast from 7am to 11 in the breakfast room. They also allow free use of body boards, beach chairs and umbrellas. They also offer free drinks ( bottled water, juice, or sodas) in the lobby.   Room:  room was modern, i booked the double queen. Has a mini fridge and microwave. Restroom was beautiful and clean. Has a rainfall shower head which was
Manager Response: We're very pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. We love all the positive feedback and do appreciate it. You and your family are welcome back anytime. Thanks again for choosing us as your place to stay.

Summary: This was our first time staying at Crescent Bay Inn and we have no complaints! When we got there, the owner showed us our room and the amenities. The room was updated and very clean. We loved having a less than 5 minute walk to the beach and they provided us with beach towels, boogie boards, and beach chairs at no additional cost! We will definitely be staying there again the next time we are in Laguna! Thanks for an amazing weekend!
Manager Response: Wow, thanks a lot for the positive feedback. You're more than welcome back next time you're in Laguna. So glad you had a great weekend.

Summary Heading: A Motel by any other name....
Summary: I booked the hotel from reading the mostly positive reviews. I was warned not to expect much from the outside but I expected to be pleasantly surprised otherwise and I was not wowed.  The hotel very much retains the remnants of a motel and for almost $300. per night, I expected more.  Don't look behind the dressers in the bedroom---dust covers the outlet and the rug. The garbage outside piled up everywhere and was quite unsightly.  Don't expect the management to answer the phone---they don't---no matter how long you let it ring.  The walls are also, motel style, paper thin--- people talking and running their TV loudly at night kept us up----and families talking loudly with crying kids, and barking dogs---woke us up. Bring ear plugs.  Oh---and when checking in they demand the
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were both really impressed with everything at the Crescent Bay Inn from start to finish. The staff are exceptional, really friendly and always looking to help, The rooms are first class and the location is perfect, right beside the beach. Would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Wow that's wonderful, so happy to hear all the positive feedback. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: Crescent Bay Inn is TERRIBLE and HORRIBLE and they STOLE my property!!!!
Summary: I would give this motel zero stars.  The rooms were actually very nice, but the outside looks run down and quite honestly the rooms when the windows are open you can hear your neighbors pretty well.  So if you're thinking you'd like to sleep with the windows open and catch that ocean breeze, forget it unless you want to hear the sounds, smells and noises emitted from your neighbor's room.  My MAIN complaint is that I had left some items in the closet.  When I called them they were able to locate the items. a coat and shirt.  Josh the worker at the motel asked if I'd like to pick them up.  I lived too far to stop back but Josh suggested they can mail it.  Great idea.  I even provided my own business ups account number.  All they needed to do was print the label and call UPS for
Manager Response: On Behalf of Crescent Bay Inn i would like to thank you for staying with us. We would like to apologize for the inconvenience and unacceptable experience you have had with us. We would like to hear more about this experience and want to make sure you have received your package. Please contact us at (949) 494-2508. We take pride in what we do here and want to make sure this doesn't happen again. Thank You

Summary: We can totally recommend this Hotel - the staff was extremely polite, you get umbrellas, beach utilities, chairs and drinks for free - the hotel is clean, new and comfortable. Don't think very much, just go there - you won't regret!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are very glad you enjoyed the rooms, and we appreciate the positive feedback. Please come back whenever you'd like. We will look forward to your return visit.

Summary Heading: On the Beach, very friendly staff
Summary: We were greeted warmly by a staff member when we arrived at about 1 pm on a Wednesday afternoon.  He showed us our room and gave a short tour of the breakfast room and facilities down to the beach.  The room was very comfortable and we were able to open windows on this warm day.  The AC was not loud.  This hotel is located on the coast highway so there can be some traffic noise.   There is a free shuttle during the time that the Pageant of the Masters runs that we took to see the show.   The wifi was good as our room was right above the office.  Snacks and juice are always available in the breakfast room.  There was a loose 120 v outlet/socket from a lamp that was not repaired and could cause a problem.
Manager Response: We are very happy you enjoyed your stay with us. We are making sure to get all the rooms amenities perfect. Thank you for letting us know. We look forward to seeing you again soon on your next visit to Laguna.

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay Close to a Fabulous Beach
Summary: We had a very pleasant stay at the Crescent Bay Inn, which lives up to the Excellent Reviews on TripAdvisor.  But what came as an unexpected bonus was the absolutely fabulous beach a short walk from The Inn.  Very beautiful sunsets.  A great end to our holiday in California.
Manager Response: I'm very glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again on your next trip to California. To catch those beautiful sunsets.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay and will recommend it to others. We'll be back next year.  The staff was very nice and welcoming and the room was very clean.  I like the outdoor sitting area and shower   It is nice to have direct beach access also.

Also one time we were leaving the Inn and the spouse came out and asked if there was anything they could help us with.  When we checked out, the part time clerk immediately offered to help us carry our clothes out because the owners had advised her about my husband's issues.
Manager Response: Thank You for choosing Crescent Bay Inn as your lodging of choice for your trip. If it is within our power we will go above and beyond for our guests to ensure their stay is enjoyable! We love to see you smile. The beds themselves are custom made and makes the user not want to wake up in the morning. We are glad you enjoyed our property and we look forward to your next visit. Thank You!

Summary: My husband and I had a great stay at Crescent Bay Inn. The only thing we didn't like was the fact that there was no pool and there were very few breakfast choices, especially the healthier ones. Everything else was wonderful!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay at the Crescent Bay Inn while vacationing in Laguna Beach. We appreciate your feedback and are always improving our hotel to better your stay. We are glad you enjoyed the experience you had with us. The breakfast is a work in progress and we have already made changes to the healthier side to improve the quality for our guests. Although we may not have a pool we do have access to Crescent Bay Beach from our hotel and its only a three minute walk. Thank you for your review. We hope to see you in the future.

Summary: The owners of the property were so helpful! Our room was beautiful and had a great view of the ocean. Only a short 3 min. walk to a beautiful beach! Don't let the outside of the building and the short walk to the beach fool you! On the weekends, from now until September, the trolley runs downtown every 20 minutes.
Manager Response: On Behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay. We thank you for your review and are very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay. We always strive to give our guests the best experience possible. We hope to see you again in the future! Thank you.

Summary Heading: Keep Looking for a Nice Affordable Place to Stay in Laguna Beach
Summary: Laguna Beach is a vibrant little town with beautiful beaches along with great restaurants and shopping.   There are quite a few very nice hotels in Laguna but their prices are pretty steep for the average family traveler.  We selected the Crescent Bay Inn after reading a number of positive reviews on TripAdvisor.  Close proximity to the beach is really important to our family.  We opted to pay a little more for an Ocean View and because it would be away from the highway noise.    The Crescent Bay Inn is an old motel that has been remodeled with new bathroom tile and fixtures, carpet, paint, and bedding. On the positive side, it is short walk to a beautiful beach and about a 20-minute walk to downtown Laguna. The family that runs the motel is friendly. The furniture is simple and
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for your feedback. We are always making improvements to enhance your stay, our breakfast is a work in progress and we have already made some changes towards making it more enjoyable. We apologize for any inconvenience you may have had while staying at the Crescent Bay Inn. We strive to give our guests the best experience possible. Thank you again for your thoughts.

Summary: We stayed for two nights at Crescent Bay Inn and it was far more than what we expected for the the price we were paying.  Even breakfast was a courtesy and Herschel, the owner/manager was always very polite and always  willing to make our stay perfect.
Manager Response: On Behalf of Crescent Bay Inn we'd like to thank you for staying with us. Service is our number one priority and we are ecstatic that you enjoy our humble accommodation. We constantly strive to be the best. We look forward to the next time we see you. Thank you!

Summary: The owner was terrific and the place is as advertised. He took time out to give me a history of Laguna Beach and its main attractions. The rooms were modernized and very clean. There was a down home feel to the place and we were extremely comfortable. It was a beautiful 3 minute walk to the beach.The cliffs and exploring the water surrounded by beautiful homes were a sight to see. Above all my wife and I enjoyed the location and the price was beyond reasonable as we celebrated our second anniversary.
Manager Response: On Behalf of all of us here at Crescent Bay Inn we'd like to thank you for coming and staying with us and choosing us as a Start to your SoCal vacation! Your kind remarks just fuels our passion and commitment to service even more! We look forward to the next time travels brings you back to the area and once again Thank You for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn.

Summary: A great location at the north end of town near Crescent Bay state park. A short (3 minute) walk to a lovely beach just below the hotel.. A warm welcome from the cheerful owner and a clean, nicely (newly) decorated room. We will be back for sure.
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for choosing us as your place of lodging during your stay. Your kind words motivates us even more to excel and constantly improve to make this place one of the best inn's Laguna Beach has to offer. Thank you and we look forward to your return.

Summary: Three cheers to Hershall at the Crescent Bay Inn. His level of customer service is A+++!!  This sweet little refurbished motel is a great value, very clean and has great access to the beach.  I would absolutely come back here in a heart beat! The location is amazing, the beds comfortable, the NetFlix option on the TV set was fantastic and the rain shower was heaven.  The rooms in the front are a bit loud as they are right on the highway. When the windows are closed with the AC on, the sounds is muted however, I would recommend paying a bit more for the ocean front building where the rooms are more quiet.  Thank you again Hershall for our stay!
Manager Response: We here at Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for staying with us. Nothing is too big or small for us and we try our best to accommodate any request the best we can. Service and Cleanliness is our Number one priority and we constantly strive to become better everyday. We thank you for your kind words and amazing review. Your review motivates us even more to do better and continue on this path of excellence. We look forward to seeing you again and Thank You!

Summary: I stumbled upon this place on yelp and decided to give it a shot based on the great reviews.  When we first pulled up to the hotel, my kids kinda freaked out because it looked "older" & nothing like what we usually stay in, but once we got in the room, they were fine.  Rooms are upgraded and clean.  The owner's son is super nice and welcoming. The hotel is a 3 minute walk to the beach!  Perfect!  We now call this place our "little hidden gem" and almost don't want to tell anyone about it, it's so great!
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for your stay. We are very happy to hear you had a great experience with us. Your kind words motivates us to constantly do better for our guests. Thank you so much for your review and we look forward to seeing you upon your next visit.

Summary: Outstanding owner and staff. Bed was very comfy and location near beach was great. Loved the outdoor patio and rain shower. The property is coming along very nicely. I was pleasantly suprised by the in room microwave and mini refrigerator.
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank your for choosing us as your place of lodging while you stayed in Laguna Beach. We are always glad to hear you had a great experience with us and we hope to see you next time you are in town!

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in Laguna!
Summary: Great location!! Hershel was amazing! Excellent service and hospitality! Steps from the beach... Close to shops! We will definitely be back!! Thank you so much for the wonderful stay! We had the best family time around the firepit!
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay. Your kind words motivates us to continue on a path of excellence and always strive to improve ourselves to make you stay even better. Thank you so much for your review. We are very much looking forward to your return!  Crescent Bay Inn

Summary: Awesome customer service, Ducshai was sweet.  Complimentary breakfast and a 3 minutes walk to beach. Fire pit a plus, just loved our time there. Planning on staying there again soonand this time with ocean view 😍
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay. We our glad that you enjoyed our comfortable rooms, easy beach access and staff. We look forward to the next time you return. Thank You!

Summary Heading: Basic Property with Clean, Nicely Appointed Rooms
Summary: I stayed here for a couple of nights to enjoy some beach time.  The receptionist was very welcoming and courteous when I met her.  Although my room was not quite ready at 3p when I checked in, the maids had it done within about 10-15 minutes of my arrival.  During that time, I went down to Crescent Bay, which is a small beach about a block downhill from the hotel.  Although the beach is pretty, it sits below numerous houses and is generally full of visitors during the day.  Fortunately, the area has many other beaches that are less crowded, such as West Street beach down the road, that are about 10 minutes away by car.  My room was well appointed with a big comfortable bed, nice television, mini fridge/freezer and a decently sized bathroom.  Parking was free and covered. I did
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Crescent Bay Inn as your stay. We are constantly making improvements to better the environment for our guests. Your review helps us grow as a hotel and motivates us to do better. We have already made improvements for the breakfast to make it healthier for our guests as well as enjoyable. We appreciate you taking the time to write us and we hope to see you soon. Thank you.

Summary: Beautifully run hotel. A beautiful secluded beach is a four-minute walk away and it is a beautiful 20 minute walk to town, with trolley service. The hotel is family run and the rooms are beautiful. There is an adequate light breakfast.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for staying with us. We always love to hear that our guests enjoyed their stay. Thank you for taking the time to write us a review it is always important to know how we can improve to better your stay. We hope to see you in the future. Thank you!

Summary: read the reviews on trip advisor so this place looked great for our girls getaway for the price point, proximity to the beach and downtown and nicely upgraded rooms. Price point was great. Definitely worth a little extra for the ocean view. The walk to the beach was perfect- straight down some steps then a block through some gorgeous homes.   Reviews said it was an easy walk to downtown and we are all walkers so thought it'd be doable but it was definitely a hike and not through the nicest part of Laguna. Would have probably stuck it out the whole way walking with my husband but my two girlfriends and I decided to call an uber after a few blocks. Worth the $4.   Rooms were lovely and modern with really nice upgrades in the bathroom and comfortable beds. Still looks like a motel
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for your stay. We always strive to give our guests the best possible experience while they reside at our hotel. The three minute walk to the beach is to  Crescent Bay beach, downtown is most definitely about a mile from the property but if you are staying on the weekends the Trolley provided by the City of Laguna Beach is complimentary and very highly recommended to get around town. We very much appreciate your feedback and kind words, it helps us know how to improve for all of our guests. Thank you again for your review and we hope to see you in the future!

Summary Heading: The ocean was the hotel pool
Summary: Made to feel welcome from the start by the owners. The room styling and cleanliness was excellent. The room amenities included Fridge, Microwave, Very large bed, ditto the television and free WiFi. The free continental breakfast room had all you could need. The beach was within five minutes walk, via steps, from the hotel down a quiet road. The hotel had facilities for disabled people and the beach is also accessible for same. The hotel had free parking, which was a boon, as parking in Laguna Beach (LB) centre was sometimes a problem. A free trolley bus service to is also available to LB at weekends. LB is only a twenty minute walk from the hotel along the Pacific coast highway. Pros: - Everything above. Cons: - The new owners have concentrated on the internal rooms, the outside
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay Inn we would like to thank you for your stay. We very much appreciate your kind words and we are so happy to hear that you enjoyed yourself while staying with us. Summary: We loved this place and the staff!!! This was just the place we were looking for. So cozy, clean, friendly and easy to find. Our ocean view room with cool ocean breezes were simply wonderful. The room was clean and had all the amenities my two boys and I needed. We really enjoyed the three minute walk to the beach. It was simply the perfect getaway place! Nothing overly fancy, but nice! It even came with breakfast! We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: The Crescent Bay Inn would like to thank you for choosing us as your place of lodging while visiting Laguna Beach. We are always happy to hear our guests enjoyed their stay, it motivates us to keep improving on our standard of excellence. We appreciate your kind words and we look forward to your return! Thank you.

Summary: My husband and I originally planned to stay two nights but unfortunately due to a work commitment we could only stay one, it definitely was our loss.  Crescent Bay is a beautiful hotel inside, don't let the outside fool you.  Our room wasn't quite ready when we arrived, so Herschell, the owner, gave us an ocean view room.  This hotel has been completely remodeled.  The décor is very modern and the room was very clean.  I especially loved the rain shower.  The private beach is approximately a 3 minute walk from the hotel and about a mile from downtown LaGuna.  If you are planning a trip to LaGuna Beach, this is the place to stay.  A beautiful hotel at a very reasonable price.  We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: On behalf of the Crescent Bay in we would like to thank you for your stay. We are always trying to improve ourselves to better our guests stay. We appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback and kind words. We look forward to your return to the Crescent Bay Inn. Thank you! :]

Summary: The owner/manager (Herschel) is so very friendly and helpful, that we asked him to join us at an evening gathering around the hotel's firepit.  The room's were just updated and wonderful, and the location is fantastic with most having a view of Laguna Beach's north coast.  There is a path to the North Coast beach that takes less than 3 minutes to walk, and the beach is very private.  The is great place to stay, AND it is very inexpensive!

Summary: Researching places to stay is always a difficult proposition. I found the Crescent Bay Inn and decided to stay at this location based on good reviews. Once I arrived at the property, I was concerned given the appearance of the outside. My approach was to make the most of the three day stay. I had an opportunity to speak with management during check in. Very nice welcome and I was escorted to my room.  Upon entering the room I was quite surprised. The rooms are nicely decorated with regular modern conveniences for a room. The bathroom and shower area were excellent and very clean. Once I had the opportunity to get settled I was very comfortable and felt relaxed.   There seemed to be some noise from the outside. Not too loud, but I could hear some occasional discussions outside my

Summary: We spent four days here during an escape from the Boston winter. We were very happy with the hotel and staff. The location was perfect. One mile from main town and steps to the beach. Ocean view rooms are worth it. Request a room away from the stairs. It was a bit noisy when people walked up and down them to get to and from their rooms. Hershel, the person who checked us in, is awesome. Super friendly and helpful with information about the town and room. Highly recommended.
